translation.yo: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea, Maurizio Sarri ti jẹ́ kí Eden Hazard mọ̀ pé òun kò dá a dúró, tí ó bá pinnu láti máa lọ.

translation.en: Sarri said truly he wanted Hazzard to remain in Chelsea, but he wil not stop him if he want to leave the football club.
translation.yo: Sarri sọ pé lòótọ́ òun fẹ́ kí Hazard ó ṣì wà nínú ikọ̀ Chelsea, ṣùgbọ́n òun kò ní dí i lọ́wọ́ tí ó bá fẹ́ fi ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù náà sílẹ̀.

translation.en: Remembering that Real Madrid Football club had wanted Hazard to join her club in Spain.
translation.yo: A ó rántí pé, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lu Real Madrid ti ń fẹ́ ki Hazard ó dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ ọ̀hún ní orílẹ̀-èdè Spain.

translation.en: And Hazard himself has said he love to join Resl Madrid, if the club is ready to buy him over.
translation.yo: Tí Hazard fúnra rẹ̀ ti sọ pe ó wu òun láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ Real Madrid, bí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún bá ṣetán láti ra òun.

translation.en: Now Chelsea football club want Hazard to sign an agreement  before the former agreement will lapse next year.
translation.yo: Ní báyìí, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea fẹ́ kí Hazard tọwọ́ bọ ìwé àdéhùn tuntun kí àdéhùn tilẹ̀ ó tó tán lọ́dún tó ń bọ̀.

translation.en: Hazard joined Chelsea in 2012 and scored a total of ten goals for chealsea in the premier league this season.
translation.yo: Hazard dara pọ̀ mọ́ Chelsea lọ́dun 2012, ó sì ti gbá àpapọ̀ ayò mẹ́wàá sáwọ̀n fún ikọ̀ Chelsea nínú ìdíjé premier league ti sáà yìí.

translation.en: --- Dream Stars Ladies unveils new Head Coach
translation.yo: --- Ikọ̀ agbábòọ̀lù obìnrin Dream Stars ṣàfihàn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tuntun.

translation.en: The team, Dream Stars Ladies of Lagos has unveiled new Head Coach, Felix Nwosu, ahead of the 2018/2019 Nigeria Women Premier League season.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù obìnrin Dream Stars ti ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó ti ṣàfihàn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà tuntun, ọ̀gbẹ́ni Felix Nwosu, ṣaájú ìdíje sáà 2018/2019 ìdíje Líìgì àwọn obìnrin orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà.

translation.en: The newly promoted Lagos based team has finalised the appointment of the widely travelled Anambra born coach.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ tí ó fi ìlú ẹ̀kọ́ ṣe ibùgbé tí ó sì ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ gba ìgbéga ọ̀hún nìgbẹ̀yìngbéyín ti gba ìlúmọ̀ọ́ká akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ọmọ bíbí ìpínlẹ̀ Anambra yìí.

translation.en: Felix Nwosu is an experienced coach who has stints with FC Talanta Kenya, Heegan FC Somali, FIN FA Enugu, FIN Angels, Ambassador Child Youth Club /Angels Enugu.
translation.yo: Felix Nwosu jẹ́ òjìmì akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tí ó ti ṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ FC Talanta lórílẹ̀-èdè Kenya, Heegan FC ní Somali, FIN FA nílùú Enugu, FIN Angels, Ambassador Child Youth Club /Angels nílùú Enugu rí.

translation.en: Nomination He was nominated and recognised by Arsenal FC/ WorldRemit amongst the best 25 Youth coaches across Africa in a pool of over 700 coaches.
translation.yo: Nínú ìfanikalẹ̀ fun àmì ẹ̀yẹ, ó jẹ́ fífàkalẹ̀ àti kíkàsí láti lọ́wọ́ ikọ̀ Arsenal/ilé iṣẹ́ WorldRemit gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọ̀kan lára àwọn akọ́nímọ́ọ̀gbá ọ̀dọ́ tí ó dáńgájíá jùlọ jákè-jádò ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀, ó wà lára akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá márùndínlọ́gbọ̀n àkọ́kọ́ nínú àpapọ̀ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tí ó lé ní ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́gbẹ̀rin

translation.en: Dream Stars Ladies Chairman, Mr AbdulRahmon Abolore said; “the club opted for Nwosu because of his wealth of experience and he is confident that the former Gor Mahia defender can help the club achieve its objectives.
translation.yo: Ẹni tí ó jẹ́ Alága ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Dream Stars Ladies, Ọ̀gbẹ́ni AbdulRahmon Àbọ̀lọrẹ sọ pé; “Ikọ̀ náà yà sí Nwosu torí àgbọ́ǹgbẹ ìrírí tí ó ní àti pé ó dá òun lójú pé agbábòọ̀lù ọwọ́ ẹ̀yin ikọ̀ Gor Mahia tẹ́lẹ̀rí ọ̀hún lè ṣe ìrànwọ́ fún ikọ̀ náà láti sọ èròńgbà rẹ̀ di mímúṣẹ.

translation.en: “Our aim is to make the best out of our promotion to the Premier League and we don’t want to leave any stone unturned.”
translation.yo: “Àfojúsùn wa ni láti kópa dáradára pẹ̀lú ìgbéga wa yìí sí inú ìdíje líìgì, a kò sì fẹ́ da òkuta kan sí láìbì lulẹ̀.

translation.en: --- There is no assurance of recovering Emiliano Sala that was missing.
translation.yo: --- Kò sí ìdánilójú ìṣàwárí Emiliano Sala tó di àwáàrí.

translation.en: The senior officer of the commission in charge of emergencies and missing aircraft in island, Mr. John Fitzgerald has said there is no hope that Sala will be recorvered.
translation.yo: Ọ̀gá àgbà ilé-iṣẹ́ tó ń rí sí ìṣẹ̀lè pàjáwìrì àti ọkọ̀ òfurufú tí ó bá di àwáti sórí erékùsù, Ọ̀gbẹ́ni John Fitzgerald ti sọ pé, kò sí ìrètí pé Sala yóò di ṣíṣàwárí mọ́.

translation.en: Emiliano Sala an Argentine, who is twenty eight (28) years old was with a pilot in a air plane that got missing yesterday Monday.
translation.yo: Emiliano Sala ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Argentina, tó jẹ́ ẹni ọdún méjìdínlọ́gbọ̀n wà pẹ̀lú awakọ̀ òfurufú nínú ọkọ̀ bàálù kan tí ó di àwátì lánàá ọjọ́ ajé (Monday).

translation.en: Furthermore, the rescue team has continued in the search for the missing airplane and the passengers on Wednesday.
translation.yo: Ṣíwájú si, ikọ̀ adóòlà ẹ̀mí ti tẹ̀síwájú nínú wíwá ọkọ̀ òfúrufú náà àti àwọn èrò inú rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́rú (Wednesday).

translation.en: An information said that Sala send a internet whatsapp message to a friend his family, that he was scared with the way the airplane is moving in air.
translation.yo: Ìròyìn kán fi léde pé Sala fi àtẹ̀jíṣẹ́ ẹ̀rọ ayélujára whatsapp ránṣẹ́ sí ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀ kan àti àwọn mọ̀lẹ́bí pé Ẹ̀rù ń ba òun pẹ̀lú bí ọkọ̀ òfúrufú náà ṣe ń ṣe lójú ofurufú.

translation.en: According to a reporter from Argentina, Sala told his family that ‘ I am in an air plane that is like it want to crash.
translation.yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ilé-iṣẹ́ akọ̀ròyìn l’orílẹ̀-èdè Argentina ṣe sọ, Sala sọ fún àwọn mọ̀lẹ́bí rẹ̀ báyìí pé "Mo wà nínú ọkọ̀ òfurufú kan tó dàbí ẹni pé ó fẹ́ ní ìjàm̀bá.

translation.en: Now around 11:30 am, Guernsey police command said, the three aircrafts  and a small airplane were in the air,as Piper Malibu is been searched for.
translation.yo: Wàyíí o ní nǹkan bí aago mọ́kànlá ààbọ̀ òwúrọ̀, ile-iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá ni Guernsey sọ pé, ọkọ̀ òfúrufú mẹ́ta àti bàálù kékeré kan wà lójú òfurufú, bí wọ́n ṣe ń wá bàálù Piper Malibu.

translation.en: Also, the policemen said they are checking the phone conversatiions if it can be of help.
translation.yo: Bákan náà ni àwọn ọlọ́pàá sọ pé àwọn ti ń ṣàyẹ̀wò àwọn ìtàkùrọ̀sọ orí ẹ̀rọ ìbánisọ̀rọ̀ láti mọ̀ bóyá ó lè ṣe ìrànwọ́

translation.en: But till now,there is no news about the missing plane.
translation.yo: Ṣùgbọ́n títí di àsìkò yìí, kò tí ì sí ìròyìn kankan nípa bàálù tó di àwáti ọ̀hún

translation.en: Sala is going to the capital city of Welsh after he has signed a contract of fifteen million pound with Bluebirds football team.
translation.yo: Olú ìlú orílẹ̀-èdè Welsh ni Sala ń lọ lẹ́yìn tó bọwọ́lu ìwé àdéhùn iṣẹ́ mílíọ́nù mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dógún owó pounds pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Bluebirds.

translation.en: --- Arsenal’s Petr Cech set to retire end of season
translation.yo: --- Petr Cech ti ikọ̀ Arsenal ṣetán àti fẹ̀yìntì nípàrí sáà yìí.

translation.en: After 20 years as a professional, Arsenal’s first choice goalkeeper Petr Cech is set to retire at the end of the 2018/2019 English Premier League (EPL) season.
translation.yo: Lẹ́yìn ogún ọdún gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́, Amùlé àkọ́kọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Arsenal Petr Cech ti ṣetán láti fẹ̀yìntì ní ìparí sáà 2018/2019 ìdíje Premier League ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì.

translation.en: The 36-year-old who joined Arsenal in June 2015 from Chelsea announced this on his twitter handle @petrcech on Tuesday.
translation.yo: Ọmọ ọdún mẹ́rìndínlògòjì ọ̀hún tí ó dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ Arsenal ní oṣù kẹfà ọdùn 2015 láti ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea kéde èyí lóri ìkànnì twitter rẹ̀ @petrcech ní ọjọ́ ìṣégun.

translation.en: “This is my 20thseason as a professional player and it has been 20 years since I signed my first professional contract.
translation.yo: “Èyí ni sáà ogún mi gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ agbábọ́ọ̀lù, ó sì ti pé ogún ọdún tí mo tọwọ́ bọ ìwé àdéhùn mi àkọ́kọ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́.

translation.en: --- Omeruo to welcome permanent move to CD Leganes
translation.yo: --- Omeruo- máa nífẹ̀ẹ́ láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù CD Leganes fún àdéhùn ọlọ́jọ́ pípẹ́.

translation.en: Super Eagles defender, Kenneth Omeruo has said that he will welcome his loan move if it is made permanent at CD Leganes because the La Liga club feel very much like home.
translation.yo: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ ẹ̀yìn ikọ̀ Super Eagles, Kenneth Omeruo ti sọ pé òun yóò gba sìsọ àdéhùn àyálò òun di àdéhùn ọjọ́ pípẹ́ nínú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù CD Leganes ní tọwọ́-tẹsẹ́ nítorí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ìdíje La Liga ọ̀hún rí bí ilé.

translation.en: Omeruo is on loan from Chelsea till the end of the season and he has already established himself at Leganes, who have done well so far to stay clear of the relegation pack.
translation.yo: Omeruo wà nínú àdéhùn aláyàálò láti inú ikọ̀ Chelsea di ìparí sáà yìí, ó sì ti di ará ilé nínú ikọ̀ Leganes ọ̀hún tí ó ṣe dára gidi gan láti jìnnà sí ìfìdírẹmi.

translation.en: “Right now, I feel more at home, having been tossed up and down on different loans deals before arriving at the Spanish side,” the Super Eagles defender opened up to media.
translation.yo: “Ní báyìí, o dà bí ẹni pé mo wà ní ilé lẹ́yìn títì káàkiri pẹ̀lú oríṣìíríṣìí àdéhùn aláyàálò kí n tó dé inú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè Spain yìí.” Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ ẹ̀yìn ikọ̀ Super Eagles ọ̀hún ló sọ èyí di mímọ̀ fún àwọn oníròyìn.

translation.en: it’s more like a dream come true for me knowing full well La Liga is rated as one of the biggest leagues in the world.
translation.yo: Ó dá bí àlá tí ó wá sí ìmúṣe fún mi gẹ́gẹ́ bí a ṣe mọ̀ pé ìdíje La Liga jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwọn ìdíje tí ó tóbi jùlọ lágbàáyé

translation.en: “I will not hesitate to sign the dotted lines for the Spanish side if the opportunity comes.”
translation.yo: Mi ò ní rò ó lẹ́ẹ̀mejì láti tọwọ́ bọ ìwé pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ yìí, tí oore-ọ̀fẹ rẹ̀ bá yọ.

translation.en: The modest Madrid club will have to shell out five million Euros to sign Omeruo, 25, on a permanent basis in the summer.
translation.yo: "Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ìlú Madrid ọ̀hún yóò ní láti ya mílíọ́nù márùn-ún owó Euros sọ́tọ̀ láti ra Omeruo ọmọ ọdún mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dọ́gbọ̀n fún àdehùn ọlọ́jọ́ pípẹ́.

translation.en: --- NFF confirms Keshi Stadium for Seychelles, Egypt matches
translation.yo: --- Àjọ NFF yan pápá ìṣeré Keshi fún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ Seychelles àti Egypt.

translation.en: The Nigeria Football Federation (NFF) is believed to have settled for the  Keshi Stadium in Asaba, Delta State to host the international friendly between the Super Eagles and the Pharaohs of Egypt and the dead-rubber last 2019 African Cup of Nations qualifying Group B match  against Seychelles.
translation.yo: Àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà (NFF) ni ìgbàgbọ́ wà pé wọ́n ti yan pápá ìṣeré Keshi ní ìlú Asaba, ìpìnlẹ́ Delta láti gbàlejò ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́sọ́rẹ̀ẹ́ àgbááyé láàrin ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles àti ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Pharaoh ti orílẹ̀-èdè Egypt tí ó fi mọ́ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìpegedé kẹyìn fún ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ọdún 2019 tí wọn yóò gbá pẹ̀lú orílẹ̀-èdè Seychelles.

translation.en: A top official in the Glass House in Abuja said that the deal to host the two matches in Asaba is almost a done deal because the Delta State Government has agreed to take 70 per cent of the cost to prosecute the matches.
translation.yo: Àgbà ọ̀jẹ̀ kan ní Olú ilé-iṣẹ́ àjọ NFF nílùú Àbújá sọ ọ́ yanya pé, aáyan láti gbàlejò àwọn ìdíje méjéèjì ní ìlú Àsàbà ti fẹ́ yọrí nítorí pé ìjọba ìpínlẹ̀ Delta ti gbà láti gbé ìdá àádọ́rin nínú ọgọ́rùn-ún iye owó tí àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọsẹ̀ ọ̀hún yóò ná wọn.

translation.en: “We have reached the final phase of discussion and all seem to be done deal as the Asaba stadium will stage the matches all things been equal,” he said.
translation.yo: “A ti dé abala ìkẹyìn ìjíròrò wa, gbogbo ètó sì ti tò pẹ̀lú bí pápá ìṣeré Asaba yóò ṣe gbàlejò àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà tí gbogbo nǹkan yóò sì ṣe yémú.” ni ó wí.

translation.en: The international match against Egypt will attract top players like Mohammed Salah of Liverpool FC, Mohammed El-Shenawy and Ahmed Hegazi.
translation.yo: "Ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́sọ́rẹ̀ẹ́ pẹ̀lụ́ Egypt yóò ní àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù jàǹkànjàǹkàn bí i Mohammed Salah ti ikọ̀ Liverpool, Mohammed El-Shenawy àti Ahmed Hegazi.

translation.en: The Governor Ifeanyi Okowa administration is said to be passionate about sports tourism and a visit of the top English Premiership star will be a big boost to Asaba and neighboring towns within the state.
translation.yo: Ìsèjọba Gómínà Ifeanyi Okowa ti jẹ́ èyí tí ó nífẹ̀ẹ́ ìrìn-àjò ìgbafẹ́ eré ìdárayá, bákan náà ni àbẹ̀wò àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù jàǹkànjàǹkàn ìdíje Premiership ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì náà yóò mú ìgbèrú bá ọrọ̀ ajé ìlú Asaba àti àwọn ìlú agbègbè rẹ̀ ní àárín ìpínlẹ̀ náà.

translation.en: --- Egypt favourite to host 2019 AFCON
translation.yo: --- Orílẹ̀-èdè Egypt ni ààyò láti gbàlejò ìdíje AFCON ti ọdún 2019.

translation.en: Egypt, the land of Pyramids is the likely host for the 2019 Africa Cup of Nations, CAF sources have hinted and by all indications the rest of the continent could be heading back to that football crazy nation next year.
translation.yo: Orílẹ̀-ẹ̀dè Egypt, ilẹ̀ onígun aborí sóńsó ni ó ṣeéṣe kí ó gbàlejò ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ti ọdún 2019, Àjọ CAF ti fi léde pé àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tó ku ní ilẹ̀ náà lè sẹ́rí lọ sí orílẹ̀-èdè tí kì í fi eré bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá ṣeré ọ̀hún ní ọdún tó ń bọ̀.

translation.en: The last time Egypt hosted the Africa Cup of Nations, the Super Eagles finished third; a third consecutive bronze medal at three straight editions.
translation.yo: Ní ìgbà kẹyìn tí orílẹ̀-èdè Egypt gbàlejò ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀, ikọ̀ Super Eagle parí pẹ̀lú ipò kẹta; pẹ̀lú gbígba àmì ẹ̀yẹ bàbà fún ìgbà kẹta léra wọn nínú ìdíje ọ̀hún mẹ́ta ní tèléǹtẹ̀lé.

translation.en: According to sources, CAF is ready to rule in favor of Egypt’s bid to host the 2019 AFCON.
translation.yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìròyin ṣe sọ, Àjọ CAF ti ṣetán láti sègbè ìfẹ́ orílẹ̀-èdè Egypt láti gbàlejò ìdíje AFCON ọdún 2019.

translation.en: AFCON President Amaju Pinnick explained that the Confederation would only consider bids from countries with the ability to host the competition.
translation.yo: Ààrẹ ìgbìmọ̀ tó ń mójú tó ìdíje AFCON, Amaju Pinnick ṣe é lálàyé pé, àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè tí agbára wọ́n gbé àtigbàlejò ìdíje náà nìkan ni ìgbìmọ̀ àwọn yóò wò ṣe.

translation.en: CAF will announce the new hosts for the 2019 AFCON on January 9.
translation.yo: Àjọ CAF yóò kéde orílẹ̀-èdè tí yóò gbàlejò ìdíje AFCON ọdún 2019 ọ̀hún ní ọjọ́ kẹsàn-án oṣù kínní ọdún.

translation.en: --- Mbappe wins French player of the year
translation.yo: --- Mbappe gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè France tí ó dára jùlọ.

translation.en: Paris Saint-Germain forward, Kylian Mbappe, has been crowned French Player of the Year for the first time.
translation.yo: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ iwájú ikọ̀ Paris Saint-Germain, Kylian Mbappe ti gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ  agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè France tí ó dára jùlọ fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́

translation.en: The 20-year-old forward who was pivotal to France winning the World Cup in Russia last summer enjoyed a remarkable 2018.
translation.yo: Ọmọ ogún ọdún ọ̀hún tí ó kópa ribiribi fún orílẹ̀-èdè France láti gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje àgbàáyé lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia ní sáà tó kọjá gbádun mérìírí ọdun 2018 yìí.

translation.en: Mbappe helped Les Bleus to go all the way, with a fine individual effort netted in a 4-2 final triumph over Croatia.
translation.yo: Mbappe ran ikọ̀ Les Bleus ọ̀hún lọ́wọ́ láti wẹ̀ yán kànhìnkànhìn pẹ̀lú àkitiyan àdáṣiṣẹ́ kára tí ó fi rí àwọ̀n he nínú ìjáwé olúborí àṣekágbá àmi ayò mẹ́rin sí méjì pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Croatia.

translation.en: Mbappe has hit 16 goals in 19 appearances for PSG this season, as they continue to chase down more trophies at home and abroad.
translation.yo: Mbappe ti gbá bọ́ọ̀lù mẹ́rìndínlógún sáwọ̀n nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ mọ́kàndínlógún tí ó ti gbá fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù PSG ní sáà yìí, pẹ̀lú bí ikọ̀ náà tún ṣe ń tẹ̀síwájú láti máa lépa ife ẹ̀yẹ nílé àti lẹ́yìn odi.

translation.en: He finished fourth in the vote for the 2018 Ballon d’Or, with that lofty standing placing him above five-time winner Lionel Messi.
translation.yo: Ó parí pẹ̀lú ipò kẹrin nínú àbájáde ìdìbò àmì ẹ̀yẹ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó dára jùlọ lágbàáyé lọ́dún 2018, pẹ̀lú ipò gíga yìí gẹ́gẹ́ bí ọmọ kékeré, èyí gbé e ṣaájú Lionel Messi Agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó ti gba àmì ẹyẹ ọ̀hún lẹ́ẹ̀marùn-ún ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀.

translation.en: Mbappe was awarded that gong by France Football, having edged out Raphael Varane and Antoine Griezmann.
translation.yo: Mbappe jẹ́ fífún ní apata yìí láti ọ̀wọ́ Àjọ Eré Bọ́ọ̀lù ilẹ̀ France, lẹ́yìn tí ó ta Raphael Varane àti Antoine Griezmann  yọ.

translation.en: He inherits the title from Chelsea midfielder N’Golo Kante, who came out on top in 2017.
translation.yo: Ó jogún àmì ẹ̀yẹ yìí lọ́wọ́ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ àárín ikọ̀ Chelsea, NGolo Kante, tí ó mókè jùlọ lọ́dún 2017.

translation.en: --- President Weah’s striker son to join Celtic on loan
translation.yo: ---Atamátàsé Ọmọ Ààrẹ Weah yóò dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Celtic pẹ̀lú àyálò.

translation.en: Timothy Weah will leave French champions Paris St Germain (PSG) on loan to join Scottish champions Celtic.
translation.yo: Timothy Weah yóò kúrò nínú ikọ̀ aṣáájú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù ilẹ̀ Faransé nnì Paris St Germain (PSG), láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ Celtic ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ilẹ̀ Scotland.

translation.en: Weah said on Tuesday.
translation.yo: Weah sọ ọ́ di mímọ̀ lọ́jọ́ ìṣẹ́gun (Tuesday).

translation.en: British media reported that the 18-year-old was set to join Scottish champions Celtic.
translation.yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ ilé-iṣẹ́ ìròyìn ilẹ̀ Bìrìtìkó ṣe sọ, ọmọ ọdún méjìdínlógún ọ̀hún ti ṣetán láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ aṣáájú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù ilẹ̀ Scotland ìyẹn Celtic.

translation.en: Weah has played only three times for PSG this season as bigger names such as Neymar, Kylian Mbappe and Edinson Cavani have limited his first-team chances.
translation.yo: Weah ti kópa fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù PSG nígbà mẹ́ta pére ní sáà yìí, látàrí àwọn olórúkọ sàǹkò bíi Neymar, Kylian Mbappe àti Edinson Cavani tí ó dín oore-ọ̀fẹ́ àtiwọ ikọ̀ àkọ́kọ́ rẹ̀ kù.

translation.en: In a message posted in French on his Instagram page, Weah thanked his PSG team mates, the coaching staff and supporters for making him feel part of the family.
translation.yo: Nínú àtẹ̀jíṣẹ́ tí a kọ lédè Faransé lórí ìkànnì Instagram rẹ̀, Weah dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ àwọn àkẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ nínú ikọ̀ PSG, àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àti àwọn olólùfé ikọ̀ náà fún àǹfààní tí wọ́n fún un láti jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára ẹ̀bí náà.

translation.en: Weah is the son of former Liberia, PSG and AC Milan striker, George Weah who is now the President of Liberia
translation.yo: Weah jẹ́ ọmọbíbí inú agbábọ́ọ̀lù tẹ́lẹ̀rí fún orílẹ̀-èdè Liberia, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù PSG àti AC Milan, George Weah, tí ó jẹ́ Ààrẹ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Liberia báyìí.

translation.en: --- this are the breakdown of the EPL competition over the weekend.
translation.yo: --- Èyí ni àtúpalẹ̀ àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìdíje EPL tí ó wáyé lópin ọ̀sẹ̀.

translation.en: Crystal Palace football team lead Manchester City with three (3) goals to two (2) in the English premier league over the weekend.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Crytsal Palace fàgbà han Manchester City pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́ta sí méjì nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìdíje premier league ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì tí ó wáyé lópin ọ̀sẹ̀.

translation.en: Also Leicester city defeated Chelsea with One (1) goal to nothing.
translation.yo: Bákan náà, ikọ̀ agbábọ̀ọ̀lu Leicester City fẹ̀yìn Chelsea bẹ́lẹ̀ pẹ̀lú àmì ayò kan sí òdo.

translation.en: Ealier in the first competiton that came up on Saturday, Arsenal football team wins Burley with three (3) goals to one (1).
translation.yo: Nínú inú àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ tí ó wáyé ṣaájú lọ́jọ́ àbámẹ́tà, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Arsenal fàgbà han Burnley pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́ta sóókan

translation.en: Southampton defeated Huddersfield with three (3) goals to one (1) special thanks to the goal scored by Micheal Obafemi.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Southampton fàgbà han Huddersfield pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́ta sóókan ọpẹ́ pàtàkì lọ́wọ́ àmì ayò tí Michael Ọbáfẹ́mi gbá sáwọ̀n.

translation.en: Also Watford defeated Ham with two (2) goals to nothing, Bournemouth wins Brighton with two (2) goals to nothing.
translation.yo: Bákan náà Watford lu West Ham pẹ̀lú àmì ayò méjì sí òdo Bournemouth na  Brighton pẹ̀lú àmì ayò méjì sí òdo

translation.en: --- FIFA ranking: Eagles end 2018 in 44th spot
translation.yo: --- ÀTẸ ÀJỌ FIFA: Ikọ̀ Super Eagles parí ọdún 2018 sípò kẹrìnlélógójì.

translation.en: Super Eagles ended the year 2018 maintaining their 44th position in the latest FIFA World Ranking released on Thursday.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles parí ọdún 2018 pẹ̀lú dídi ipò kẹrìnlélógójì wọn mú síbẹ̀ nínú àtẹ àjọ FIFA tuntun tí wọ́n gbé jáde lọ́jọ́bọ (Thursday).

translation.en: The three-time African champions also retained their fourth position in Africa.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù yìí tí ó ti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ lẹ́ẹ̀mẹta ọ̀tọ̀òtọ̀ tún di ipò kẹrin wọn mú ní ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ síbẹ̀.

translation.en: Senegal also retained top spot in Africa with Tunisia, Morocco, Nigeria and DR Congo completing the top five teams on the continent.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè Senegal dipò kínní wọn mú síbẹ̀ pẹ̀lú bí ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Tunisia, Morocco, Nàìjíríà àti DR Congo ṣe pajú ikọ̀ márùn-ún àkọ́kọ́ ní ilẹ̀ náà dé.

translation.en: Belgium remain top in the latest ranking with France (2nd, unchanged), Brazil (3rd, unchanged), Croatia (4th)  and England (5th).
translation.yo: Belgium ni ó di ipò kínní mú síbẹ̀, France ipò kejì síbẹ̀, Brazil ipò kẹta síbẹ̀ Crotia wà ní ipo kẹrin, nígbà tí England wà ní ipò karùn-ún lágbàáyé.

translation.en: The next FIFA/Coca-Cola World Ranking will be published on February 7, 2019.
translation.yo: Ipò àtẹ àjọ FIFA/Coca-Cola mìíràn yóò tún jáde lọ́jọ́ keje, oṣù kejì, ọdún 2019.

translation.en: --- Mourinho welcomed me back to Premier League- Ranieri
translation.yo: --- Mourinho kí mi káàbọ̀ padà sínú ìdíje Premier League - Ranieri

translation.en: Claudio Ranieri revealed on Thursday that Jose Mourinho was the first manager to welcome him back to the Premier League when he was appointed Fulham boss last month.
translation.yo: Claudio Ranieri sọ lọ́jọ́bọ (Thursday) pé Jose Mourinho ni akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àkọ́kọ́ tí ó kí òun káàbọ̀ padà sínú ìdíje Premier League nígbà tí wọ́n yan òun gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Fulham lóṣù tó kọjá.

translation.en: Fulham visit Old Trafford on Saturday, where Mourinho’s Manchester United will hope to secure their first Premier League victory in five games, reuniting the pair for the first time since Ranieri’s departure from Leicester.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Fulham yóò tẹkọ̀ létí lọ sí pápá ìṣeré Old Trafford ní ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta (Saturday), níbi tí ìrètí wà pé ikọ̀ Manchester United yóò ti jáwé olúborí nínú ìdíje Premier League fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnṣẹ̀ márùn-ún ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀, èyí tí yóò tún gbé àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá méjéèjì pàdé ara wọn láti ìgbà tí Ranieri ti fi ikọ̀ Leicester sílẹ̀.

translation.en: But the Fulham manager said: “He was the first who sent me a message to say ‘welcome back’.
translation.yo: Àmọ́ ṣá, akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Fulham ti sọ pé  “Òun ni ẹni àkọ́kọ́ tó kọ́kọ́ fi àtẹ̀jíṣẹ́ ránṣẹ́ sími láti sọ pé ‘káàbọ̀ padà’

translation.en: He is a very friendly friend.
translation.yo: Ọ̀rẹ́ mi dạ́adáa ló jẹ́.

translation.en: “I have known him for a long time, when he came to Chelsea and when he was in Italy, and he was very polite with me.
translation.yo: Mo ti mọ̀ ọ́n láti ọjọ́ tó ti pẹ́, láti ìgbà tí ó wá sínú ikọ̀ Chelsea láti orílẹ̀-èdè Italy, o ń ṣe dáradára sími.

translation.en: He’s a great man, coach, manager.
translation.yo: Akínkanjú ọkùnrin, akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àti Alákòóso ni ó jẹ́.

translation.en: Bottom side Fulham produced an encouraging performance in Wednesday’s 1-1 draw with Leicester, giving the 67-year-old Ranieri one victory, one draw and one defeat from his three matches in charge.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Fulham tí ó wà ní ìsàlẹ̀ tábìlì kópa tí ó wúni lórí nínú ọ̀mì àmì ayò kọ̀ọ̀kan pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Leicester lọ́jọ́rùú (Wednesday), èyí fún Ranieri ẹni ọdún mẹ́tàdínláàádọ́rin ní ìjáwé olúborí kan, ọ̀mì kan àti ìpàdánù kan pẹ̀lú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ mẹ́ta tí ó ti tukọ̀.

translation.en: --- Presidency, NFF receive Falcons in Abuja
translation.yo: --- Ilé-iṣẹ́ Ààrẹ, Àjọ NFF lọ pàdé ikọ̀ Super Falcons ní ìlú Àbújá.

translation.en: The Chief of Staff to the President, Alhaji Abba Kyari,  led a delegation of prominent Nigerians and top officials of the Nigeria Football Federation who received the Super Falcons on arrival in Abuja on Sunday evening.
translation.yo: Olórí òṣìṣẹ́ Ọba sí Ààrẹ Alhaji Abba Kyari, léwájú ìgbìmọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn jàǹkàn-jàǹkàn àti àwọn ọ̀gá àgbà nínú àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà (NFF) tí ó lọ pàdé ikọ̀ Super Falcons bí wọ́n ṣe dé sí ìlú Àbújá nírọ̀lẹ́ ọjọ́ Àìkù (Sunday).

translation.en: Nine-time African champions, Super Falcons, flew into the Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport few minutes before 4pm.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Falcons tí ó ti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ àwọn Obìnrin ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ní ẹ̀ẹ̀mẹsàn-án ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ balẹ̀ sí pápákọ̀ òfurufú àgbááyé Nnamdi Azikiwe ní aago mẹ́rin ku ìṣẹ́jú díẹ̀.

translation.en: Some of the Super Falcons team that flew into Abuja are NFF General Secretary, Dr Mohammed Sanusi, as well as other officials of the NFF.
translation.yo: Lára àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ikọ̀ Super Falcons tí ó wọ ìlú Àbújá ni akọ̀wé àpapọ̀ àjọ NFF, Dókítà Mohammed Sanusi, tí ó fi mọ́ àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ àjọ NFF mìíràn.

translation.en: On Saturday at the Accra Sports Stadium, the Falcons prevailed over a resilient South African Banyana Banyana side 4-3 on penalties after a scoreless 120 minutes, to lift the top African women football diadem for the third successive time and ninth time overall.
translation.yo: Ní ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta (Saturday), ní pápá ìṣeré Accra, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Falcons gbo ewúro sí ikọ̀ Banyana Banyana ti orílẹ̀-èdè South Africa lójú pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́rin sí mẹ́ta nínú golí-wò-mi-n-gbá-a-sí-ọ lẹ́yìn ọgọ́fà ìṣẹ́jú láìráwọ̀n he láti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ àwọn Obìnrin tí ó tóbi jù nilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ yìí ní ìgbà mẹ́ta lé ara wọn tí ó sì fi pé mẹ́sàn-án ní àpapọ̀.

translation.en: “On behalf of Mr President, who is not in the country at the moment, we say welcome and well done to you.
translation.yo: Ní orúkọ Ààrẹ, ẹni tí kò sí nílùú lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ báyìí, a kí gbogbo yín káàbọ̀ padà, ẹ sì tún kú iṣẹ́.

translation.en: In fact, as we were leaving the airport, two eminent Nigerians called and donated the sum of N50m and N25m respectively to your team.
translation.yo: Kódà, bí a ṣe ń kúrò ní pápákọ̀ ofurufú, àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà jàǹkàn méjì ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ pè wọ́n fún ṣètọrẹ àádọ́ta míllíọ́nù náírà (N50m) àti mílíọ́nù márùndínlọ́gbọ̀n náírà (N25m) fún ikọ̀ yìí.

translation.en: Please rest very well.
translation.yo: Ẹ jọ̀wọ́, ẹ sinmi dáradára.

translation.en: We will get back to you with the activities lined up for you in the coming days.”
translation.yo: A ó kàn si yín lórí àwọn ẹ̀tọ́ tí a ti là kalẹ̀ fun yín láìpẹ́

translation.en: NFF General Secretary Mohammed Sanusi, said, “On behalf of the leadership of the NFF, we are grateful for the support from the Nigerian government, which has seen the team excel at the Cup of Nations.
translation.yo: Akọ̀wé àpapọ̀ àjọ NFF, Mohammed Sanusi sọ báyìí pé, “Ní orúkọ àwọn adarí àjọ NFF, a mọ rírì àtìlẹyìn láti ọ̀dọ̀ ìjọba ilẹ̀ Nàìjííríà, èyí tí ó ran ikọ̀ yìí lọ́wọ́ láti ṣàṣeyọrí nínú ìdíje ifẹ ẹ̀yẹ náà.

translation.en: The girls have promised to do their best to represent the country very well at the 2019 Women’s World Cup.”
translation.yo: Àwọn ọmọbìnrin yìí ti wá ṣèlérí sísa gbogbo ipá wọn láti sojú orílẹ̀-èdè náà dáradára nínú ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé ọdún 2019.

translation.en: --- Berhalter named coach of U.S. men’s national football team
translation.yo: --- Berhalter ti di kíkéde gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù àwọn ọkùnrin orílẹ̀-èdè US.

translation.en: Former Columbus Crew manager Gregg Berhalter was officially named the next coach of the U.S. men’s national football team on Sunday.
translation.yo: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Columbus Crew tẹ́lẹ̀rí Gregg Berhalter ni wọ́n ti kéde gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tíṣé kan fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù àwọn ọkùnrin orílẹ̀-èdè US ní ọjọ́ àìkú (Sunday)

translation.en: The 45-year-old Berhalter replaces interim coach Dave Sarachan to become the youngest coach to lead the team since Steve Sampson in 1995.
translation.yo: Berhalter ẹni ọdún márùndínláàádọ́ta rọ́pò akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá fìdíhẹ̀ẹ́ Dave Sarachan láti di ẹni tí ó kẹ́rẹ́ jù tí yóò tu ikọ̀ náà láti àkókò Steve Sampson lọ́dun 1995.

translation.en: “We are excited to announce Gregg as the next head coach of the U.S. Men’s National Team,” said U.S. Soccer president Carlos Cordeiro in a statement.
translation.yo: “Inú wa dùn lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ láti yàn Gregg gẹ́gẹ́ bí gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù àwọn ọkùnrin orílẹ̀-èdè US” nínú ọ̀rọ̀ Ààrẹ ìgbìmọ̀ Eré Bọ́òlù ilẹ̀ náà Carlos Cordeiro.

translation.en: “As an experienced former national team player and highly regarded professional coach, we are confident he is the best person to guide our programme forward.
translation.yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí agbábọ́ọ̀lù ikọ̀ tẹ́lẹ̀rí tí ó ní ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ ìrírí, àti òjìmì akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá, ó dá wa lójú pé òun ni ẹni tí ó tọ́ láti tẹ̀ wá síwájú.

translation.en: “We are looking forward to formally introducing him on Tuesday in New York.”
translation.yo: À ń fojúsọ́nà láti ṣafihàn rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ ìṣẹ́gun (Tuesday) nílùú New York.

translation.en: Berhalter will be officially introduced at a press conference at noon ET on Tuesday.
translation.yo: Berhalter yóò di fífihàn nínú ìpàdé àwọn oníròyìn kan ní agogo mẹ́jìlá ọ̀sán ọjọ́ ìṣẹ́gun (Tuesday)

translation.en: A former player, Berhalter was on the 2002 and 2006 FIFA U.S. World Cup roster.
translation.yo: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ikọ̀ yìí tẹ́lẹ̀rí, Berhalter wà nínú àlakalẹ̀ ikọ̀ náà fún ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé ọdún 2002 àti ọdún 2006.

translation.en: --- President Buhari congratulates Super Falcons for emerging African champions
translation.yo: --- Ààrẹ Buhari kí ikọ̀ Super Falcons kú oríire gbígba ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀.

translation.en: President Muhammadu Buhari last night congratulated the Super Falcons of Nigeria on their victory over the Banyana Banyana of South Africa Saturday in the final match of the 11th Africa Women Cup of Nations (AWCON), Ghana 2018.
translation.yo: Ààrẹ Muhammadu Buhari lálẹ́ àna kí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Falcons ti orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà kú oríire jíjáwé olúborí pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Banyana Banyana ilẹ̀ South Africa lọ́jọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday) nínú àṣekágbá ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá àwọn obìnrin nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà (AWCON) ẹ̀ẹ̀kọkànlá irú rẹ̀ Ghana 2018.

translation.en: The President expressed particular delight at the discipline and commitment exhibited by the country’s senior women football team despite the stiff resistance of their South African counterparts.
translation.yo: Ààrẹ fi ìdùnnú rẹ̀ hàn púpọ̀ látàrí iṣẹ́ ìfọmọlúàbíṣe àti ìfarajìn ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù àwọn àgbà obìnrin pẹ̀lú bí akẹẹgbẹ́ wọn láti orílẹ̀-èdè South Africa ṣe gbóná gidigidi.

translation.en: Noting that the Super Falcons had earlier qualified to represent Nigeria at the FIFA Women World Cup tournament in France next year, President Buhari described winning the AWCON for the third consecutive time and ninth overall, as the “icing on the cake.”
translation.yo: O tẹnu mọ́ ọ pé ikọ̀ Super Falcons ti kọ́kọ́ pegedé láti ṣojú orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà nínú ìdíje Ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé àwọn Obìnrin tí yóò wáyé ní orílẹ̀-èdè France ní ọdún tó ń bọ̀, Ààrẹ ṣàpèjúwe ìjáwé olúborí ìdíje AWCON yìí fún ìgbà kẹta léra wọn tí ó sì fi pé mẹ́sàn-án ní àpapọ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí “oyin inú àkàrà náà”

translation.en: Saluting the country’s female football ambassadors for doing their fatherland proud and showing clear dominance on the African continent, he urged them to approach the France 2019 competition with clear focus and determination to excel on the global stage.
translation.yo: Nígbà tí ó ń gbóríyìn fún ikọ̀ obìnrin orílẹ̀-èdè yìí fún ṣíṣeé mú yangàn àti ìjẹgàba lórí ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀, ó rọ̀ wọ́n láti lọ sínú ìdíje France 2019 pẹ̀lú àfojúsùn ńlá àti ìpinnu láti yege ní ìpele àgbááyé.

translation.en: President Buhari also commended the team’s coaching crew, the Nigerian Football Federation (NFF), Supporters Club and all football-loving citizens for adequately preparing and supporting the players, enjoining all stakeholders not to relent in rallying round the country’s football representatives going forward.
translation.yo: Ààrẹ Bùhárí tún gbóríyìn fún àwọn ikọ̀ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá, àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà (NFF), àwọn alátìlẹyìn àti gbogbo àwọn ọmọ ìlú tí wọ́n jẹ́ olólùfẹ́ eré bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá fún ìgbáradì tó mọ́yánlórí àti àtìlẹyìn wọn fún àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù, ó rọ àwọn alẹ́nulọ́rọ̀ láti máse wararo lórí ìgbìyànjú láti rí i pé àwọn ikọ̀ tí ó sojú orílẹ̀-èdè náà nínú eré bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá ń tẹ̀síwájú. Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ààrẹ tún gbóṣùbà káre fún àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá wọn gbogbo, àjọ NFF àti àwọn olólùfẹ́ jákèjádò lágbàáyé kú iṣẹ́ ribiribi eléyìí ti ́ó fara hàn nínú bí wọ́n ṣe kópa sí.

translation.en: “I have never doubted the capacity of Nigerians to excel when given the right support,” he noted, while promising the Federal Government’s commitment to sports development as a unifying force.
translation.yo: “Èmi kì í ṣe iyèméjí lórí ìyege àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà tí a bá fún wọn ní àtìlẹyìn tó yẹ” èyí ni ó tẹnu mọ́ nígbà tí ó ń ṣèlérí ìfarajìn ìjọba àpapọ̀ fún ìdàgbàsókè eré ìdárayá gẹ́gẹ́ bí ohun èlò ìṣọ̀kan.

translation.en: --- Rohr reveals what excites him about Super Eagles attack
translation.yo: --- Rohr ṣàlàyé ohun tí ó ń dùn ún nínú nípa ọwọ́ iwájú ikọ̀ Super Eagles.

translation.en: As Nigeria gear up for their engagements next year after successfully qualifying for the 2019 Africa Cup of Nations, coach of the senior national team of Nigeria Gernot is excited about the options available to him in attack.
translation.yo: Bí orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà ṣe ń gbáradì fún àwọn ojúṣe wọn lọ́dún tó ń bọ̀ lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n ti pegedé fún ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ti ọdún 2019, Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ àgbà orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà Gernot ti fi ìdùnnú rẹ̀ hàn lórí àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó wà nílẹ̀ fún un láti gbá ọwọ́ iwájú.

translation.en: Following their 1-1 draw against South Africa, Nigeria will begin preparation for the next AFCON in March when they play Seychelles and one particular area of the team which the coach is not bother about is the options available to him in attack.
translation.yo: Lẹ́yìn ọ̀mì àmì ayò kọ̀ọ̀kan pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ South Africa, ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà yóò bẹẹrẹ ìgbáradì fún ìdíje AFCON tó ń bọ̀ ní inú oṣù kẹta nígbà tí wọn yóò ma wàákò pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Seychelles, ọgangan pàtàkì nínú ikọ̀ ọ̀hún tí kò kọ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá yìí lóminú ni àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó wà nílẹ̀ fún un láti gbá ọwọ́ iwájú.

translation.en: Rohr insist the Nigerian team has options which makes the team more exciting in attack with pace as the main asset of all of them.
translation.yo: Rohr tún tún un sọ pé Ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà ní àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí yóò mú kí ikọ̀ náà ó ta sánsán ní ọwọ́ iwájú.

translation.en: “We want to have quick players on the wings.The new boys are doing well. You have Kalu, Simon Chukwueze, Victor Osimhen who scored on Sunday and Collins. I like the competition. For instance Kalu can defend and at the same time attack which is good for the team,” the coach said.
translation.yo: “A ní àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù ayárabí àṣá lẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́. Àwọn ọmọkùnrin tuntun wònyí ń ṣe dáadáa. Ẹ ní Kálu, Simon Chukwueze, Victor Osimhen àti Collins tó rí àwọn he ní ọjọ́ àìkú (Sunday). Mo fẹ́ràn ifagagbága náà. Bí àpẹẹrẹ, Kálu lè di ẹ̀yìn mú, ó sì le gbá ọwọ́ iwájú léyìí tí ó jẹ́ oríire fún ikọ̀ náà” ni akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ọ̀hún wí.

translation.en: ---Pinnick hails Zenith Bank for AFCON 2019 ticket
translation.yo: --- Pinnick gbóríyìn fún ilé ìfowópamọ́ Zenith fún ìpegedé AFCON ọdún 2019

translation.en: The NFF President, Mr. Amaju Pinnick, has hailed Zenith Bank Plc. for its support towards the qualification of the Super Eagles for the 2019 African Cup of Nations (AFCON) slated for Cameroon.
translation.yo: Ààrẹ àjọ NFF, Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Amaju Pinnick ti gbóríyìn fún ilé ìfowópamọ́ Zenith fún ìpegedé sí ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ (AFCON) ọdún 2019 tó yóò wáyé ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon

translation.en: While presenting an autographed jersey of the Super Eagles to the Group Managing Director/ Chief Executive Officer of Zenith Bank Plc, Mr. Peter Amangbo, as a thank you gesture from all the players for the bank’s support towards the team’s qualification for the 2019 AFCON, Pinnick thanked the bank for its continuous support towards the development of football and sports in general in the country.
translation.yo: Lásìkò tí ó ń ṣe ìfifúnni aṣọ ìgbábọ́ọ̀lù ikọ̀ Super Eagle tí a ti bọwó lù fún Olùdarí/Ọ̀gá àgbà ilé ìfowópamọ́ Zenith, ìyẹn Ọ̀gbẹ́ni. Peter Amangbo gẹ́gẹ́ bi  ìdúpé láti ọ̀dọ̀ gbogbo àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù fún àtìlẹyìn ilé ìfowópamọ́ náà lórí ìpegedé wọn fún ìdíje AFCON ọdún 2019, Pinnick dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ ilé ìfowópamọ́ náà fún àtilẹ́yìn gbogbo ìgbà wọn lórí ìdàgbàsókè eré bọ́ọ̀lù àti eré ìdárayá lápapọ̀ ní orílẹ̀-èdè náà.

translation.en: He noted that the story may have been different if not for the bank’s contributions and support, which was no doubt very vital to the recent qualification of the Super Eagles for the 2019 AFCON Championship.
translation.yo: Ó tẹnu mọ́ ọn pé ọ̀tọ̀ ni ohun tí a ò bá máa sọ bí kì í bá ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ àti àtìlẹyìn ilé ìfowópamọ́ náà, tí ó jẹ́ pé láìsí tàbí ṣùgbọ́n ó ṣe pàtàkì sí ìpegedé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagle fún ìdíje AFCON ọdún 2019 lẹ́nu lọ́ọ́lóọ́ yìí.

translation.en: While responding, Amangbo reaffirmed the commitment of the bank towards supporting all the national football teams, and promised to continue to fulfill its part of the partnership with a view to ensuring that Nigerian national football teams take their pride of place in global football.
translation.yo: Nígbà tí ó ń fèsì, Amangbo tún fi àrídájú ìfarajìn ilé ìfowópamọ́ náà múlẹ̀ lórí àtìlẹyìn fún gbogbo ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè, ó sì tún ṣe ìlérí láti mú àwọn ìlérí tirẹ̀ ṣe lójúnà àtimú kí àwọn ikọ̀ agbábóọ̀lù ilẹ̀ Nàìjííríà ó ṣe é mú yangàn lágbàáyé.

translation.en: --- Super Falcons qualify for AWCON final
translation.yo: --- Ikọ̀ Super Falcons pegedé sí àṣekágbá ìdíje AWCON

translation.en: The Super Falcons of Nigeria have qualified for the final of the ongoing African Women Cup of Nations in Ghana.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Super Falcons orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà ti pegedé sí àṣekágbá ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ àwọn obìnrin tí ó ń lọ lọ́wọ́ ní orílè.-èdè Ghana.

translation.en: Super Falcons edged past the Cameroonian team 4-2 in the penalty shoot-out after 120 minutes of play.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Super Falcons fàgbà han ikọ̀ Cameroon pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́rin sí méjì nínú Golí-wò-mí-n-gbá-a-sí-ọ lẹ́yìn ọgọ́fà ìṣẹ́jú ìfigagbága.

translation.en: With this result, Nigeria has qualified for the 2019 World Cup.
translation.yo: Pẹ̀lú èsì yìí, orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà ti pegedé sí àṣekágbá ìdíje AWCON ọdún 2019.

translation.en: --- Didier Drogba retires from active football
translation.yo: --- Didier Drogba fẹ̀yìntì nínú eré bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá

translation.en: Former Chelsea and Ivory Coast forward Didier Drogba has confirmed his retirement as a player.
translation.yo: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ iwájú ikọ̀ Chelsea àti Ivory Coast tẹ́lẹ̀ rí Didier Drogba ti kéde ìfẹ̀yìnti rẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí agbábóọ̀lù.

translation.en: The 40-year-old scored 164 goals in 381 appearances over two spells with Chelsea, helping them win the Premier League four times and the Champions League in 2012, as well as four FA Cup triumphs and three League Cup victories.
translation.yo: Ọmọ ogójì odun ọ̀hụ́n gbá àmì-ayò mẹ́rìnlẹ́lọ́gọ́jọ sáwọ̀n nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀rìnlélọ́ọ̀ọ́dúnrúnlékan fún ìṣí ẹ̀ẹ̀méji ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ tí ó fi kópa fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea, èyí tí ó ràn wọ́n lọ́wọ́ láti gba Ife ẹ̀yẹ Premier League ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì lẹ́ẹ̀mẹrin àti ife ẹ̀yẹ Champions League ní ọdún 2012, tí ó fi mọ́ ife ẹ̀yẹ FA àti ife Líìgì mẹ́ta.

translation.en: Drogba had been playing this season in the United States with Phoenix Rising, the second-tier club at which he is a co-owner. The veteran forward had been expected to hang up his boots following the United Soccer League Cup final defeat to Louisville City earlier this month.
translation.yo: Drogba ti ń gbá bọ́ọ̀lù ní sáà yìí ní orílẹ̀-èdè United States pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Phoenix Rising, ikọ̀ onípele kejì tí òun pẹ̀lú wà lára àwọn tí ó ni í. Ògbóhùntarìgì agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ iwájú yìí ni wọ́n ti lérò pé yóò feyìntì lẹ́yìn ìpàdánù àṣekágbá ife ẹ̀yẹ Líìgì United Soccer sọ́wọ́ Louisville City ní ìbẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ oṣù yìí.

translation.en: And confirmation arrived on Wednesday evening as Drogba posted a picture of him as a youngster on his social media accounts, accompanied by a farewell message.
translation.yo: Tí èrí sì padà jáde ní ìrọ̀lẹ́ ọjọ́rùú (Wednessday) pẹ̀lú bí Drogba ṣe gbé àwòrán ìgbà kékeré rẹ̀ sí orí ìkànnì ayélujára rẹ̀ tòhun ti ọ̀rọ̀ ìdágbére.

translation.en: --- AWCON 2018: Super Falcons thrash Zambia’s Shepolopolo 4-0
translation.yo: --- Ìdíje AWCON ọdún 2018: Ikọ̀ Super Falcons lu ikọ̀ Shepolopolo orílẹ̀-èdè Zambia pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́rin sí òdo

translation.en: Nigeria’s Super Falcons beat the Shepolopolo of Zambia 4-0 on Wednesday at Cape Coast in Ghana to return to contention at the 11th African Women Cup of Nations.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Super Falcons orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà lu ikọ̀ Shepolopolo orílẹ̀-èdè Zambia pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́rin sí òdo ní ọjọ́rùú (Wednessday) ní Cape Coast ní orílẹ̀-èdè Ghana láti tẹ̀síwájú nínú ìdíje ìkọkànlá ife ẹ̀yẹ àwọn obìnrin ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀.

translation.en: The defending champions, who lost their opening match on Sunday, bounced back into contention with an emphatic win which sent them to the top of the group’s table, at least temporarily.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ tí ife ẹ̀yẹ náà wà lọ́wọ́ rẹ̀ yìí tí ó kọ́kọ́ pàdánù ìfẹsẹ̀wọnṣẹ̀ ìṣíde wọn lójọ́ Àìkú (Sunday) tún agbára mú wá pẹ̀lú ìjáwé olúborí tó jọjú léyìí tí ó gbé wọn sí òkè téńté tábìlì ìpín wọn fún ìgbà díẹ̀ náà.

translation.en: Desire Oparanozie scored the opening goal for a 1-0 half-time lead, while Francesca Ordega added the second goal minutes into the second half.
translation.yo: Desire Oparanozie gbá àmi ayò ìṣíde wọlé láti léwájú pẹ̀lú àmì ayò kan sí òdo ní sáà àkọ́kọ́, nígbàtí Francesca Ordega fi àmì ayò ìkejì kun un ní ìṣẹ́jú díẹ̀ tí abala kejì bẹ̀rẹ̀.

translation.en: Oparanozie soon added another goal to make it 3-0, while substitute Amarachi Okoronkwo put the icing on the cake with her goal to make it 4-0.
translation.yo: Oparanozie tún fi òmíràn kún un láti sọ ọ́ di àmì ayò mẹ́ta sí òdo, nígbà tí Amarachi Okoronkwo tí wọ́n gbé wọlẹ́ tọ́ oyin sí ẹ̀gbẹ́ àkàrà pẹ̀lú àmì ayò rẹ̀ láti sọ ọ́ di mẹ́rin sí òdo.

translation.en: The win helped Nigeria to dislodge Zambia at the head of Group B table, ahead of the South Africa versus Equatorial Guinea match which comes up later in the day.
translation.yo: Ìjáwé olúborí yìí ni ó jẹ́ kí Ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà ó gbọ́n ikọ̀ Zambia kúrò bí ipò kíní lórí tábìlì ṣaájú ìdíje ikọ̀ South Africa àti ikọ̀ Equatorial Guinea tí yóò wáyé láìpẹ́ lónìí.

translation.en: The Falcons will now take on Equatorial Guinea in their final group phase match on Saturday, while the Shepolopolo face South Africa on the same day.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Falcons yóò wá máa bá ikọ̀ Equatorial Guinea wàákò nínú ìdíje ìkẹyìn àbala àkọ́kọ́ ní ọjọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday), nígbà tí ikọ̀ Shepolopolo yóò kojú ikọ̀ South Africa ní ọjọ́ yìí kan náà.

translation.en: --- President Buhari congratulates Super Eagles for AFCON 2019 qualification
translation.yo: --- Ààrẹ Buhari kí ikọ̀ Super Eagles kú oríire ìpegedé sínú ìdíje AFCON ọdún 2019

translation.en: President Muhammadu Buhari has congratulated the Super Eagles of Nigeria on their qualification for the 2019 Africa Cup of Nations in Cameroon.
translation.yo: Ààrẹ Muhammadu Buhari ti kí ikọ̀ Super Eagles orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà kú oríire ìpegedé sínú ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ọdún 2019 tí yóò wáyé ní orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon.

translation.en: His message came soon after the score draw against the Bafana Bafana of South Africa in Johannesburg on Saturday.
translation.yo: Ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ jáde lẹ́yìn òmì tí wọ́n ta pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Bafana Bafana orílẹ̀-èdè South Africa ní ìlú Johannesburg ní ọjọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday).

translation.en: The President joins millions of football-loving Nigerians in commending the team for their spirited and disciplined performance against a very formidable opponent, which earned them qualification with the final match against Seychelles a mere formality. .
translation.yo: Ààrẹ kùn ọ̀gọ̀ọ̀rọ̀ àwọn olólùfẹ́ eré bọ́ọ̀lù ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà láti gbósùbà fún ikọ̀ náà fún ìṣiṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú ìpinu àti ìfọmọlúàbíṣe wọn nínú ìfigagbága pẹ̀lú ògbóǹtarìgì aṣòrokọlù ikọ̀ yìí, èyí tí ó mú wọn pegedé lẹ́yẹòsọkà tí ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìkẹyìn wọn pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Seychelles sì jẹ́ àgbáṣeré.

translation.en: He equally commends the coaching crew, the Nigeria Football Federation (NFF) and the Supporters Club, especially Nigerians residing in South Africa, who turned out in great numbers to cheer the players, for a job well-done.
translation.yo: Ààrẹ Bùhárí tún gbóríyìn fún àwọn ikọ̀ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá, àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà (NFF), àwọn alátìlẹyìn pàápàá jùlọ àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà tí wọn ń gbé ní orílẹ̀-èdè South Africa tí wọ́n tú jáde láti wú àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù náà lórí, fún iṣẹ́ takuntakun yìí.

translation.en: President Buhari assured the Super Eagles of the unflinching support of the Federal Government going forward.
translation.yo: Ààrẹ Bùhárí fi àtilẹ́yìn gbogbo ìgbà Ìjọba Àpapọ̀ dá ikọ̀ Super Eagle lójú.

translation.en: --- Belgium stays perfect in UEFA Nations League
translation.yo: --- Belgium dúró ṣinṣin nínú ìdíje Líìgi UEFA Nations.

translation.en: Michy Batshuayi proved a more than capable replacement for the injured Romelu Lukaku on Thursday when he scored twice as Belgium beat Iceland 2-0 to maintain its 100 percent record in the inaugural UEFA Nations League.
translation.yo: Michy Batshuayi fi ara rẹ̀ hàn gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹni tì ó kọjá bẹ́ẹ̀ láti rọ́pò Romelu Lukaku tí ó fara pa ní ọjọ́bọ (Thursday) nígbà tí ó gbá àmì ayò méjì wọlé nínú ìjáwé olúborí pẹ̀lú àmì ayò méjì sóódo ikọ wọn àti ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Iceland nínú ìdíje Líìgi UEFA Nations.

translation.en: After 65 minutes of pounding the Iceland defense, captain Eden Hazard found Thomas Meunier on the right and the Paris Saint-Germain winger crossed for Batshuayi to slot the ball home.
translation.yo: Lẹ́yìn Ìṣẹ́jú márùndínláàdọ́rin tí wọ́n ti ń dárí sọ ọwọ́ ẹ̀yìn ikọ̀ Iceland, Balógun ikọ̀ Eden Hazard ṣàwárí Thomas Meunier ní apá ọtún orí pápá tí agbábọ́ọ̀lù ẹ̀gbẹ́ ikọ̀ Paris Saint-Germain ọ̀hụ́n nà á sí Batshuayi láti gbá bọ́ọ̀lù ayò náà wọlé.

translation.en: The second goal was even easier for the on-loan Valencia striker, as he tapped the ball into the net after Hans Vanaken’s shot had rebounded to him.
translation.yo: Àmì ayò kejì tìlẹ̀ rọrùn fún agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó wà nínú ikọ̀ Valencia pẹ̀lú àdéhùn àyálò yìí pẹ̀lú bí ó ṣe ta bọ́ọ̀lù sáwọ̀n nígbà tí ayò tí Hans Vanaken gbá padà wá sí ọ̀dọ̀ rẹ̀.

translation.en: Belgium has nine points from three games in Group 2 of League A, three ahead of Switzerland.
translation.yo: Belgium ní àmì mẹ́sàn-án nínú ìdíje mẹ́ta tí wọ́n ti gbá nínú ìpín kejì ṣaájú ikọ̀ Switzerland.

translation.en: A draw against the Swiss on Sunday will be enough to take Belgium through to the Final Four in June. Iceland lost all 4 matches and is relegated.
translation.yo: Òmì pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Orílẹ̀-èdè Switzerland ti tó láti mú ikọ̀ Belgium wà lára àwọn ikọ̀ mẹ́rin àkọ́kọ́ ní inú oṣù kẹfà. Ikọ̀ Iceland pàdánù gbogbo ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ mẹ́rẹ̀ẹ̀rin wọn, wọ́n sì ti fìdírẹmi.

translation.en: --- UEFA Nations League: Croatia Stuns Spain
translation.yo: --- ìdíje Líìgì UEFA Nations: Croatia fìyà jẹ Spain

translation.en: Croatia will now head to London with a spring in their step while Spain are left to ponder back-to-back defeats under their new coach Luis Enrique.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Croatia báyìí yóò fò tọ kọ́sọ́ lọ sí ìlú London nígbà tí ikọ̀ Spain ti di fífi sẹ́yìn pẹ̀lú ìfojúwiná ìfìdírẹmi lábẹ́ akónimọ̀ọ́gbá tuntun Luis Enrique.

translation.en: Spain passed up the chance to seal progress to the Nations League finals as they were beaten 3-2 by Croatia on Thursday, undone by a 93rd-minute winner from Tin Jedvaj.
translation.yo: Spain pàdánù oore-ọ̀fẹ́ àti tẹ̀síwájú níní àṣekágbá ìdíje Líìgì UEFA  yìí pẹ̀lú bí wọ́n ṣe pàdánù pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́ta sí méjì sọ́wó orílẹ̀-èdè Croatia ní ọjọ́bọ (Thursday), èyí tí ó wáyé pẹ̀lú àmì ayò ìṣẹ́jú kẹtàléláàádọ́rùn-ún tí Tin Jedvaj gbá wọlé.

translation.en: Jedvaj’s late strike leaves Group 4 wide open ahead of its final fixture between England and Croatia on Sunday.
translation.yo: Àmì ayò ọwọ́ ìparí Jedvaj’s ni ó sí ilẹ̀kùn ọ̀wọ́ kẹrin sílẹ̀ gbayawu ṣaájú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ kẹyìn tí yóò wáyé ní àárín ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè England àti ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Croatia ní ọjọ́ àìkú (Sunday).

translation.en: The victors will qualify, while Spain can still go through if the match at Wembley finishes in a draw. Croatia were deserving winners in Zagreb, where Jedvaj scored twice – his first international goals – to snatch a memorable victory at the end of a pulsating contest.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ tí ó bá jáwé olúborí yóò pegedé, pẹ̀lú bí ó tún ṣe ṣeéṣe kí ikọ̀ Spain ó tún padà pegedé tí ìdíje yìí tí yóò wáyé ní pápá ìṣeré Wembley bá parí sí ọ̀mì. Croatia ni ó yẹ kí ó borí ní Zagreb, níbi tí Jedvaj ti rí àwọn he lẹ́ẹ̀mejì – àmì ayò rẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ nínú ìdíje àgbááyé – pẹ̀lú ìjáwé olúborí mánigbàgbé lẹ̀yìn ìfagagbága tó gbóná girigiri yìí.

translation.en: Croatia will now head to London with a spring in their step while Spain are left to ponder back-to-back defeats under their new coach Luis Enrique, following their surprise loss by the same scoreline at home to England last month.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Croatia báyìí yóò fò tọ kọ́sọ́ lọ sí ìlú London nígbà tí ikọ̀ Spain ti di fífi sẹ́yìn pẹ̀lú ìfojúwiná ìfìdírẹmi lábẹ́ akónimọ̀ọ́gbá tuntun Luis Enrique, pẹ̀lú ìpadánù tí ó yani lẹ́nu yìí tí ó jẹ́ irú àbájáde kan náà nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ pẹ̀lú orílẹ̀-èdè England ní ilé wọn ní oṣù tó kọjá.

translation.en: Spain are at least safe from relegation, which cannot be said of either England or Croatia, who could still both finish first or last come Sunday night. England will be relegated if they lose or are held to a score draw. Croatia will go down if they are beaten or draw 0-0.
translation.yo: Spain ti bọ́ lọ́wọ́ ìfìdírẹmi, èyí tí a kò lè fi ògún rẹ̀ gbárí fún ikọ̀ England tàbí Croatia, tí wọ́n ṣì lè parí pẹ̀lú ipò kínní tàbí ipò ìkẹyìn, èyí wà lọ́wọ́ àbájáde alẹ́ ọjọ́ àìkú (Sunday). England yóò fìdí rẹmi tí wọ́n bá pàdánù tàbí tí wọ́n ta ọ̀mì. Croatia yóò bọ́ rẹ́lẹ̀ tí wọ́n bá lù wọ́n tàbí ta ọ̀mì òdo sí òdo.

translation.en: --- Djokovic crushes Zverev at ATP Finals
translation.yo: --- Djokovic po Zverev mọ́lẹ̀ nínú àṣekágbá ìdìje ATP

translation.en: World number one Novak Djokovic produced a rock-solid performance to dismantle the challenge of German firebrand Alexander Zverev at the ATP Finals on Wednesday.
translation.yo: Novak Djokovic àkọ́kọ́ nínú àwọn Onítẹníìsì àgbááyé ṣẹ́ jáde lọ́nà tó lágbára láti fẹ̀yìn alásọ iná ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Germany nnì Alexander Zverev bẹ́lẹ̀ nínú àṣekágbá ìdìje ATP lójọ́rùú (Wednesday).

translation.en: The Serb, 10 years older than his opponent, was made to work hard in an absorbing first set but Zverev’s challenge crumbled at the O2 Arena as Djokovic won 6-4 6-1.
translation.yo: Ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Serbia yìí, fi ọdún mẹ́wàá ju alátakò rẹ̀ tí ó fi ojú rẹ̀ winá lẹ́yìn alátakò yìí tí ó ti kọ́kọ́ gbìyànjú ní abala àkọ́kọ́, gbogbo ìgbìyànjú Zverev ní pápá ìṣeré O2 Arena forí sánpọ́n pẹ̀lú bí Djokovic ṣe borí pẹ̀lú àmì méfà sí mẹ́rin, mẹ́fà sí ọ̀kan.

translation.en: The victory helped the five-times champion to move within sight of the semi-finals.
translation.yo: Ìjáwé olúborí yìí ni ó jẹ́ kí Ẹni tí ó ti gba àmì ẹyẹ yìí ní ẹ̀ẹ̀marùn-ún ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ láti tọ kọ́sọ́ sí ìpele tí ó kángun sí àṣekágbá.

translation.en: Djokovic, who will end the year as world number one for the fifth time in his career after a storming second half of the season, leads the Gustavo Kuerten group.
translation.yo: Djokovic, tí yóò parí ọdún yìí gẹ́gẹ́ bí ẹni-ipò kíní lágbàáyé fún ìgbà karùn-ún nínú ìgbésí ayé rẹ̀ lẹ́yìn abala kejì sáà yìí tí ó gbóná girigiri ni ó síwájú ọ̀wọ́ Gustavo Kuerten.

translation.en: This helped the Serb to seal his 33rd win in his last 35 matches.
translation.yo: Èyí ni ó mú ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Serbia yìí jáwé olúborí fún ìgbà ìkẹtàlélọ́gbọ̀n nínú ìfigagbága márùndínlógójì tí ó ti gbá sẹ́yìn.

translation.en: --- Bafana clash: Musa, Balogun, 20 others train in Asaba
translation.yo: --- IÌfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Bafana: Musa, Balogun, àti àwọn ogún mìíràn gbáradì ní Asaba

translation.en: Gernot Rohr had 22 of his invited players train on Tuesday at the Stephen Keshi Stadium, Asaba, as they begin full preparations for Saturday’s 2019 Africa Cup of Nations qualifying battle against the Bafana Bafana at the FNB Stadium, Johannesburg.
translation.yo: Gernot Rohr ti ní agbábọ́ọ̀lù mẹ́jìlélógún tí ó ń gbáradì lọ́wọ́ ní pápá ìṣeré Stephen Keshi ní ìlú Àsàbà nínú àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó fìwé pè, pẹ̀lú bí wọ́n ṣe bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ìmúrasílẹ̀ fún ìdíje ìpegedé sí ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ọdún 2019 pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Bafana Bafana ní pápá ìṣeré FNB ní ìlú Johannesburg.

translation.en: Only Bordeaux striker Samuel Kalu, who is expected in camp today, was not part of the training.
translation.yo: Àtàmátàsé ikọ̀ Bordeaux Samuel Kalu, tí wọn ń retí ní ìpàgọ́ lónìí nìkan ni kò sí nínú ìgbáradì náà.

translation.en: Stand-in captain Ahmed Musa as well as goalkeepers Daniel Akpeyi, Theophilus Afelokhai and Ikechukwu Ezenwa and defenders Olaoluwa Aina, Adeleye Aniyikaye, Semi Ajayi, Bryan Idowu, William Troost-Ekong, Leon Balogun, Kenneth Omeruo and Jamilu Collins trained.
translation.yo: Nínú wọn ni Balogun Ahmed Musa pẹ̀lú àwọn aṣọ́lé Daniel Akpeyi, Theophilus Afelokhai àti Ikechukwu Ezenwa àti àwọn adiẹ̀yìnmú Olaoluwa Aina, Adeleye Aniyikaye, Semi Ajayi, Bryan Idowu, William Troost-Ekong, Leon Balogun, Kenneth Omeruo àti Jamilu Collins pèlú gbára dì.

translation.en: There were also midfielders Oghenekaro Etebo, John Ogu and Mikel Agu, and forwards Kelechi Iheanacho, Moses Simon, Victor Osimhen, Henry Onyekuru, Alex Iwobi, Isaac Success and Samuel Chukwueze.
translation.yo: Lára wọn tún ni àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ àárín Oghenekaro Etebo, John Ogu àti Mikel Agu, àti àwọn ọwọ́ iwájú Kelechi Iheanacho, Moses Simon, Victor Osimhen, Henry Onyekuru, Alex Iwobi, Isaac Success àti Samuel Chukwueze.

translation.en: On Matchday 1 of the qualifying series, South Africa won 2-0 with goals from Tokelo Rantie and Percy Tau right inside the Godswill Akpabio Stadium, as Coach Gernot Rohr sent out a young, inexperienced Nigerian squad.
translation.yo: Nínú ífẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ ìpegedé, South Africa jáwé olúborí pẹ̀lú àmì ayò méjì sí òdo pẹ̀lú ayò láti ọwọ́ Tokelo Rantie àti Percy Tau ní inú pápá ìṣeré Godswill Akpabio, pẹ̀lú bi akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá Gernot Rohr ṣe lo àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè kéékèèké tí wọn kò tíi ní ìrírí.

translation.en: --- We’re not afraid of Nigeria, insists Baxter
translation.yo: --- A kò bẹ̀ẹ̀rù ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà, Baxter tún un sọ.

translation.en: Bafana Bafana coach Stuart Baxter says he and his team holds no fear over facing Nigeria’s Super Eagles in Saturday’s 2019 Africa Cup of Nations qualifier at the FNB Stadium, Johannesburg.
translation.yo: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Bafana Bafana Stuart Baxter sọ ọ́ yanya pé òun àti ikọ̀ òun ò fòyà rárá láti kojú ikọ̀ Super Eagle orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà lọ́jọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday) nínú ìdíje ìpegedé sí ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ọdún 2019 tí yóò wáyé ní pápá ìṣeré FNB ní ìlú Johannesburg. .

translation.en: Baxter, who is gunning for his third win in three games when Bafana face the Super Eagles, expects the three-time African champions to have vengeance on their mind ahead of the clash.
translation.yo: Baxter, tí ó ń lépa àtiborí fún ìgbà kẹta nígbà tí ikọ̀ Bafana bá kojú ikọ̀ Super Eagles, lérò kí ikọ̀ tí ó ti gba Ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ lẹ́ẹ̀mẹta ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ yìí ní ète ìgbẹsan lọ́kàn ṣaájú ìfigagbága náà..

translation.en: The British gaffer led South Africa to a 2-1 win over Nigeria in 2004 in a Mandela Challenge before defeating the Super Eagles 2-0 in a 2019 AFCON qualifier in Uyo in June 2017 – his first match in his second stint at the helms.
translation.yo: Ọmọ ilẹ̀ Bìrìtìkó yìí kó ikọ̀ South Africa borí ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà pẹ̀lú àmì ayò méjì sí ọ̀kan ní ọdún 2004 níní ìfigagbága fún Mandela kí ó tó di pé ó fìyà jẹ ikọ̀ Super Eagles pẹ̀lú àmì ayò méjì sí òdo 2-0 nínú ìdíje ìpegedé sí ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ọdún 2019 ní Uyo nínú oṣù kẹfà ọdún 2017 – ìdíje àkókọ́ rẹ̀ nínú ìṣí ẹ̀ẹ̀kejì nínú ikọ̀ náà.

translation.en: -- Flying Eagles to play Ghana, Benin in WAFU tourney
translation.yo: -- Ikọ̀ Flying Eagles yóò kojú ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Ghana, àti ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Benin nínú ìdíje WAFU

translation.en: Nigeria’s U-20 team, Flying Eagles, will battle their counterparts from Ghana, Niger Republic and Benin Republic in Group B of the WAFU U-20 Cup Tournament holding in Lome, Togo, from December 6 to 16.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí ọjọ́ orí wọn kò ju ogún ọdún lọ yóò máà wàákò pẹ̀lú akẹẹgbẹ́ wọn láti orílẹ̀-èdè Ghana, Niger Republic àti Benin Republic ní ìpín B ìdíje kòmẹsẹ̀óyọ ife ẹ̀yẹ́ WAFU àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí ọjọ́ orí wọn kò ju ogún ọdún lọ tí yóò wáyé ní Lome lórílẹ̀-èdè Togo, láti ọjọ́ kẹfà sí ọjọ́ kẹrìndínlọ́gún oṣù kejìlá.

translation.en: Organisers have put the competition together as a major preparatory programme for the sub-region’s five teams that have qualified to participate at the 2019 Africa U-20 Cup of Nations in Tanzania from February 2 to 17, 2019.
translation.yo: Àwọn Alákòóso ètò ti to àwọn ìdíje wọ̀nyí ní ìmurasílẹ̀ pàtàkì de àwọn ikọ̀ márààrún láti ẹkùn kọ̀ọ̀kan tí wọ́n ti pegedé láti kópa nínú ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ́ WAFU àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí ọjọ́ orí wọn kò ju ogún ọdún lọ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Tanzania láti Ọjọ́ kejì sí ọjó kẹtàdínlógún oṣù kejì ọdún 2019.

translation.en: Seven-time champions Nigeria, alongside Senegal, Burkina Faso, Ghana and Niger Republic will take part in the 11-day tourney in Lome. The five countries will be joined in Tanzania by Burundi, Angola and the hosts.
translation.yo: Ikọ Nàìjííríà tí ó ti gba ife idíje yìí ní ẹ̀ẹ̀meje ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ yóò máa kópa nínú ìdíje kòmẹsẹ̀oyọ̀ ọlọ́jọ́ mọ́kànlá yìí pẹ̀lú àwọn ikọ̀ bíi ikọ̀ Senegal, Burkina Faso, Ghana àti ikọ̀ Niger Republic ní Lome. Ikọ̀ Burundi àti Angola tí wọ́n gbàlejò ìdíje yìí yóò kún àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè márùn yìí.

translation.en: The Flying Eagles play against the Young Squirrels of Benin in their first match of the tournament on December 7, before matches against Junior Mena of Niger Republic (Dec. 9) and Ghana’s Black Satellites (Dec. 12).
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Flying Eagles wàákò pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Young Squirrels ti orílẹ̀-èdè Benin nínú ìdíje àkọkọ wọn fún kòmẹsẹ̀oyọ náà ní ọjọ́ keje oṣù kejìlá, kí wọ́n tó kọlu ikọ̀ Junior Mena ti orílẹ̀-èdè Niger Republic ní ọjọ́ kẹsàn-án oṣù kejìlá àti ikọ̀ Black Satellites orílẹ̀-èdè Ghana ní ọjọ́ kejìlá oṣù kejìlá.

translation.en: --- Chinese club joins race to sign Victor Moses
translation.yo: --- Ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè China dara pọ̀ mọ́ àwọn tí wọn ń lépa àtira Victor Moses

translation.en: T‎he future of Victor Moses at Chelsea appears to be bleak after coach of the team Maurizo Sarri omitted him from his squad for the Europa League game against Bate Borisov, .
translation.yo: Ọjọ́ iwájú Victor Moses nínú ikọ̀ Chelsea kò dájú lẹ́yìn tí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá wọn Maurizo Sarri yọ orúkọ rẹ̀ kúro nínú ikọ̀ rẹ̀ tí yóò máa kojú Bate Borisov nínú ìdíje Líìgì Europa.

translation.en: Moses was told in clear terms by Sarri that he is free to leave the team in January when the transfer window opens and since then the Nigerian hasn’t made the matchday squad for any of their game.
translation.yo: Sarri sọ ọ́ kan Moses lójú pé ó lè fi ikọ̀ náà sílẹ̀ nínú oṣù kínní ọdún nígbà tí fèrèsé ojú ọjà bá ṣí sílẹ̀. Láti ìgbà yìí ni ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà kò tí rí ọ̀kankan nínú àwọn ìdíje wọn gbá.

translation.en: Crystal Palace and Wolverhampton Wanderers have signified their interest in his services and latest reports monitored by Owngoalnigeria.com has it that champions of Chinese Super League Shanghai SIPG have also joined his chase.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Crystal Palace àti ikọ̀ Wolverhampton Wanderers ti fi ìfẹ wọn hàn sí ìṣọwọ́ṣiṣẹ́ rẹ̀ bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ìròyìn tí ó jáde ní yàjóyàjó láti ọwọ́ OwngoalNàìjííríà.com sọ ọ́ di mímọ̀ pé Ikọ̀ Líìgì ilẹ̀ China Shanghai SIPG ti dara pọ̀ láti máa lépa àtirà á.

translation.en: --- Rohr picks Afelokhai as Uzoho’s replacement
translation.yo: --- Rohr mú Afelokhai gẹ́gẹ́ bí arọ́pò Uzoho

translation.en: Nigeria manager Gernot Rohr has handed a late call-up to Enyimba netminder Theophilus Afelokhai as replacement for Francis Uzoho for the Africa Cup of Nations qualifier against South Africa and international friendly against Uganda this month.
translation.yo: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà Gernot Rohr ti fi késí Asọ́lé ikọ̀ Enyimba Theophilus Afelokhai gẹ́gẹ́ bí arọ́pò Uzoho fun ìdíje ìpegedé sínú ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ South Africa àti ìdíje ọlórẹ̀ẹ́sọ́rẹ̀ẹ́ àgbááyé pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Uganda nínú oṣù yìí.

translation.en: Uzoho was forced to pull out of the Super Eagles roster after suffering an injury this past weekend which will keep him on the sidelines for at least four weeks.
translation.yo: Uzoho fi agídí kúro nínú àlàkalẹ̀ àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù ikọ̀ Super Eagles látàrí èṣe tí ó ṣe lópin ọ̀sẹ̀ tó kọjá tí yóò fi wà létíi pápá ná fún ọ̀ṣẹ̀ mẹ́rin ókéré tán.

translation.en: Nigeria will face South Africa in Johannesburg on November 17 before meeting Uganda three days later in Asaba.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà yóò kojú ikọ̀ South Africa ní Johannesburg lọ́jọ́ kẹtàdínlógún oṣù kọkànlá kí ó tó di pé wọn ó pàdé ikọ̀ Uganda lẹ́yìn ọjọ́ kẹta ní ìlú Asaba.

translation.en: --- Man City goes top after masterclass performance
translation.yo: --- Ikọ̀ Man City gòkè lẹ́yìn ìfakọyọ ńlá

translation.en: A rampant Manchester City reclaimed top spot in the Premier League overnight after a statement victory over Southampton, Pep Guardiola’s men won 6-1 at home as Raheem Sterling bagged a double in the rout. Elsewhere, Chelsea became their closest rivals after a comfortable 3-1 win over Crystal Palace.
translation.yo: Ògbónhùntarìgì ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Manchester City ti gba ipò àkọ́kọ́ wọn padà nínú ìdíje Premier League ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì tí ó wáyé lálẹ́ àná lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n lu ikọ̀ Southampton ní àlùbami, ikọ̀ tí Pep Guardiola kó sòdí yìí jáwé olúborí pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́fà sí ọ̀kan ní ilé wọn pẹ̀lú bí Raheem Sterling ṣe rí àwọn he lẹ́ẹ̀mejì nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà. Lápá ibòmìírà, Ikọ̀ Chelsea di orogún tí ó súnmọ́ wọn jùlọ lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n fi ara balẹ̀ fìyàjẹ ikọ̀ Crystal Palace pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́ta sí ọ̀kan.

translation.en: --- AFCON qualifier: Bafana Bafana names squad to face Nigeria
translation.yo: --- Ìdìje Ìpege AFCON: Bafana Bafana dárúkọ ikọ̀ tí yóò kojú orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà

translation.en: Bafana Bafana coach Stuart Baxter has recalled midfielder Thulani Serero of SBV Vitesse FC in the Netherlands in his squad for the must-win 2019 Africa Cup of Nations (Afcon) qualifier against Nigeria at FNB Stadium on 17 November.
translation.yo: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Bafana Bafana Stuart Baxter ti pe agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ àárín Thulani Serero ti ikọ̀ SBV ní orílẹ̀-èdè Netherlands sínú ikọ̀ rẹ̀ fún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnṣẹ̀ àìgbọdọ̀máborí ìdíje ìpegedé sínú ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ (AFCON) ọdún 2019 wọn pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà ní pápá ìṣeré FNB Stadium ní ọjọ́ kẹtàdínlógún oṣù kọkànlá.

translation.en: --- Nigeria will qualify for 2019 AFCON : Rohr
translation.yo: --- Ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà yóò pegedé sí ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ (AFCON) ọdún 2019 : Rohr

translation.en: Nigeria head coach Gernot Rohr believes that his side can secure either a draw or win against South Africa to qualify for the 2019 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON).
translation.yo: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá Gernot Rohr gbàgbó pé ikọ̀ rẹ̀ lè borí tàbí kí wọ́n ta ọ̀mì nínú ìdíje pẹ̀lú orílẹ̀-èdè South Africa láti pegedé sínú ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ (AFCON) ọdún 2019.

translation.en: The Super Eagles are currently placed at the top of Group E standings with nine points and they will face Bafana Bafana on 17 November in Johannesburg, South Africa.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles ti wà lókè téńté tábìlì pẹ̀lú àmì mẹ́sàn-án nínú ìpín E, wọn yóò sì kojú ikọ̀ Bafana Bafana ní ọjọ́ kẹtàdínlógún oṣù kọkànlá ní ìlú Johannesburg lórílẹ̀-èdè South Africa

translation.en: A draw or win for Nigeria in South Africa will be enough to secure the West African giants’ place in the finals which will be hosted by Cameroon.
translation.yo: Ọ̀mì tàbí ìjáwé olúborí ti tó fún àgbà ikọ̀ apá ìwọ̀ oòrùn ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ yìí láti rí ààyè nínú ìdíje tí orílẹ̀-èdè Cameroon yóò gbàlejò rẹ̀ yìí.

translation.en: --- Nigeria moves up , now 44th in FIFA ranking
translation.yo: --- Ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà gòkè, ipò kẹrìnlélógójì ni wọ́n wà báyìí lórí àtẹ ipò FIFA

translation.en: Nigeria’s Super Eagles have moved up by four spots to the 44th in the world in the October FIFA -Coca-Cola Ranking
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Super Eagles orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà ti tẹ àkàbà mẹ́rin gòkè síi sí ipò kẹrìnlélógójì lágbàáyé nínú àtẹ Cocacola FIFA tí osù kẹwàá.

translation.en: In the ranking table published on the website of the world football governing body on Thursday, Nigeria garnered 1431 points as against 1415 it had in September.
translation.yo: Ní orí àtẹ tábìlì tí wọ́n gbé jáde lórí ìkànnì ìgbìmọ̀ àpapọ̀ eré bọ́ọ̀lù lágbàáyé ní ọjọ́bọ (Thursday), orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà ní ààmì àmì òjìlélégbèjedínmẹ́sàn-án ju àmì òkòólégbèjedínmárùn-ún tí wọ́n ní nínú oṣù kẹsàn-án.

translation.en: The movement has now placed Nigeria as the third in Africa behind Tunisia and Senegal.
translation.yo: Ìgbéga yìí ti wá gbé ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà gẹ́gẹ́ bí onípòkẹta ní ilẹ Adúláwò lẹ́yìn ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Tunisia àti ikọ̀ Senegal.

translation.en: It should be calls that it was during this period that the Eagles thrashed Libya 4-0 (home) and 3-2 (away) in the African Cup of Nations qualifiers.
translation.yo: Ó ṣe pàtàkì láti rántí pé ní àkókò yẹn ni ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà dáná ìyà fún ikọ̀ Lybia pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́rin sí òdo ní ilé wọn àti àmì ayò mẹ́ta sí méjì ní àjò nínú ìdíje ìpegedé sínú ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀.

translation.en: Tunisia is ranked 22nd in the world and Senegal 25th.
translation.yo: Tunisia ni ó wà ní ipò kejìlélógún nígbà tí Senegal wà ní ipò karùndínlógbọ̀n.

translation.en: Congo DR (ranked 46th and Morocco(47th) are the other African countries among the top 50.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Congo DR (wà ní ipọ̀ kẹrìndínláàádọ́ta tí Morocco jẹ́ ìkẹtàdíláàádọ́ta tí àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ mìíràn sì wà nínú aádọ́ta àkọ́kọ́.

translation.en: On the global scene, Belgium are now ranked world number one, ahead of France with the narrowest of margin–just one point in the new FIFA/Coca-Cola World Ranking published today. The Belgians have 1733 points to France’s 1732 points.
translation.yo: Káàkiri àgbááyé, Belgium ni ó wà ní ipò kínní báyìí ṣíwájú France tí ó fi tíntinní yẹ̀sílẹ̀ pẹ̀lú àmì kan péré nínú àtẹ Cocacola FIFA tí ó jáje lónìí. Ikọ̀ Belgium ní àmì Òjìlélẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́gbèsándínméje, tí France sì ní àmì Òjìlélẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ́gbèsándínmẹ́jọ.

translation.en: The top two remain out in front after a month in which each of them enjoyed a win and a draw, with Belgium and France beating Switzerland (8th, unchanged) and Germany (14th, down two) respectively in the UEFA Nations League. Brazil are third with 1669 points, Croatia fourth with 1635 and England fifth with 1619 points. Leo Messi’s Argentina are ranked 12th in the world.
translation.yo: Àwọn méjèèjì di ọ̀kè téńté mú síbẹ̀ lẹ́yìn oṣù kan tí àwọn méjéèjì ti ń fi ìjáwéolúborí àti òmì panu, pẹ̀lú bí ikọ̀ Belgium ṣe na ikọ̀ Switzerland kò jẹ́ kí ikọ̀ yìí kúrò ní ipò kẹjọ bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni lílù tí France lu Germany nínú ìdíje Líìjì UEFA Nations jẹ́ kí wọn ó jábọ́ lẹnu àkàsọ méjì lọ sí ipò kẹrìnlá. Brazil dipò kẹta mú pẹ̀lú àmì ọ̀tàlélẹ́gbèjọlémẹ́sàn-án, tí Croatia ipò kẹrin pẹ̀lú àmì òjìlélẹ́gbèjọlémárùn-ún lórí tábìlì, England ipò karùn-ún àmì okòólélẹ́gbẹ̀jọ-dín-ọ̀kan nígbà tí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Argentina Leo Messi wà ní ipò kejìlá lórí tábìlì.

translation.en: --- Pliskova storms into WTA Finals semis
translation.yo: --- Pliskova yege sínú ìpele tó kángun sí àṣekágbá ìdíje WTA

translation.en: Czech Karolina Pliskova stormed into the semi-finals on Thursday after a convincing straight sets victory against compatriot Petra Kvitova, sending the former Wimbledon champion crashing out of the WTA Finals in Singapore.
translation.yo: Ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Czech Karolina Pliskova ti yege bọ́ sínú ìpele tó kángun sí àṣekágbá ní ọjọ́bọ (Thursday) lẹ́yìn tí ó ó lu Petra Kvitova akínkanjú tí ó ti gba ìdíje ọ̀hún rí tí ó sì yọwọ́ kílàńkó rẹ̀ kúrò nínú àṣekágbá ìdíje WTA tí yóò wáyé ní ìlú Singapore.

translation.en: Pliskova became the first player into the final four after a 6-3, 6-4 triumph in 83 minutes.
translation.yo: Pliskova di aláyò àkọ́kọ́ tí ó kọ́kọ́ pegedé sínú àṣekágbá ẹlẹ́ni mẹ́rin ọ̀hún lẹ́yìn tí ó borí pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́fà sí mẹ́ta, mẹ́fà sí mẹ́rin ní ẹ̀tàlélọ́gọ́rin ìṣẹ́jú.

translation.en: Kvitova needed to win in straight sets to keep her campaign alive but struggled throughout to complete a disappointing first WTA Finals appearance since 2015, the result puts pressure on reigning champion Caroline Wozniacki, who needs to defeat unbeaten Elina Svitolina in straight sets to keep her title defence alive.
translation.yo: Kvitova nílò láti láti jáwé olúborí kanlẹ̀ láti lè tẹ̀síwájú àti máa fakọyọ ṣùgbọ́n ó jà fitafita ni láti lè parí ìfigagbága ìpele náà fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ láti ọdún 2015, àbájáde ìfigagbága yìí da jìnnìjìnnì bo Caroline Wozniacki tí àmì ẹyẹ ìdíje náà wà lọ́wọ́ rẹ̀ lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́, ẹni tí ó nílò láti lu Elina Svitolina kanlẹ̀ láti lè di àmì ẹ̀yẹ yìí mú síbẹ̀.

translation.en: Former world number one Pliskova booked her spot in the semi-finals for the second straight year.
translation.yo: Pliskova aláyò àkọ́kọ́ nínú ìdíje náà nígbàkanrí wá ààyè fún ara rẹ̀ ní ìpele tó kángun sí àṣekágbá fún ìgbà kejì léra wọn.

translation.en: --- Messi sidelined for 3 weeks with fractured arm
translation.yo: --- Messi di yíyọ sẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ fún ọ̀sẹ̀ mẹ́tà látàrí èṣe apá.

translation.en: FC Barcelona captain Lionel Messi will be out of action for three weeks after he fractured his right arm during Saturday’s 4-2 La Liga win over Sevilla, a club statement said.
translation.yo: Balógun ikọ̀ Barcelona yóò máa gbélẹ̀ wòran fún ọ̀sẹ̀ mẹ́ta gbáko látàrí èṣe apá ọ̀tún rẹ̀ nínú ìjáwé olúborí ìdíje La liga wọn lórí ikọ̀ Sevilla pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́rin sí méjì ní ọjọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday). Àtẹ̀jáde ikọ wọn kan ló sọ eléyìí di mímọ̀.

translation.en: The injury ruled him out of the ‘Clasico’ against arch rivals Real Madrid on Oct. 28.
translation.yo: Ifarapa yìí yọ ọ́ kúrò nínú ikọ̀ tí yóò kojú orogún Real Madrid nínú ìfigagbága ‘Clasico’ tí yóò wáyé ní ọjọ́ kejìdínlọ́gbọ̀n oṣù kẹwàá.

translation.en: Ousmane Dembele replaced Messi in the 25th minute after the Argentine was examined by club doctors on the sidelines following a challenge by Sevilla’s Franco Vazquez.
translation.yo: Ousmane Dembele rọ́pò Messi ní ìṣẹ́jú mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dọ́gbọ̀n tí ìdíje náà bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí Dókítà ti yẹ̀ ẹ́ wò tán létí ìlà látàrí ìkọlù òun Franco Vazquez ọmọ ikọ̀ Sevilla.

translation.en: In addition to missing the ‘Clasico, Barca’s all-time top scorer will be unavailable in Wednesday’s UEFA Champions League clash at home to Inter Milan.
translation.yo: Ní àfikún sí ìfigagbága ‘Clasico’ Agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí o rí àwọn he jùlọ fún ikọ̀ Barca yìí kò tún ní sí lórí pápá lọ́jọ́rùú (Wednesday) nínú ìdíje UEFA Champions League ní ilé wọn pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Inter Milan.

translation.en: --- Mikel Obi hails Eagles
translation.yo: --- Mikel Obi gbósùnbà fún ikọ̀ Eagles

translation.en: Super Eagles captain Mikel Obi has praised the team after they defeated Libya 4-0 on Saturday in an AFCON 2019 qualifier game in Uyo. Mikel, who was absent from the game due to niggling injury problems, congratulated the team for their spirit and as well the hero of the day Odion Ighalo who fired a hat-trick.
translation.yo: Balógun ikọ̀ Super Eagles Mikel Obi ti gbósùbà fún ikọ̀ náà lẹ́yìn ikọ̀ náà gbo ewúro sí ikọ̀ Libya lójú pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́rin sí òdo ní ọjọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday) nínú ìdíje ìpegedé sínú ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ (AFCON) ọdún 2019 wọn ní ìlú Uyo. Mikel tí kò sí nínú ìdíje náà látàrí ìfarapa fún ikọ̀ náà ki ikọ̀ náà fún ìpinnu wọn bákan náà Odion Ighalo akọni ọjọ́ náà tó rí àwọn he lẹ́ẹ̀mẹta.

translation.en: --- 2019 AFCON Qualifier: Eagles camp opens today
translation.yo: --- ìdíje ìpegedé (AFCON) ọdún 2019: Ìpàgọ ikọ̀ Eagles di ṣíṣí lónìí.

translation.en: Super Eagles camp  in Uyo will come alive today as Coach Gernot Rohr is expecting no fewer than 16 players to hit the Akwa Ibom state capital to commence preparations ahead of the crucial 2019 AFCON qualifier against Libya Saturday.
translation.yo: Ìpàgọ́ ikọ̀ Super Eagles yóò di ṣíṣí padà lónìí pẹ̀lú bí Gernot Rohr ṣe ń retí okéré tán agbábọ́ọ̀lù mẹ́rìndínlógún láti balẹ̀ sí olú ìlú ìpínlẹ̀ Akwa Ibom láti leè bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ igbáradì ṣaájú ìfigagbága pàtàkì ìdíje ìpegedé sínú (AFCON) ọdún 2019  tí wọ́n ní pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Libya lọ́jọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday).

translation.en: Leicester City of England duo of Kelechi Iheanacho and Wilfred Ndidi, as well as Udinese defender, William Troost-Ekong are expected to lead 13 other players into the Super Eagles’ camp today, officials have confirmed. Watford striker, Isaac Success already arrived Lagos yesterday and is expected to fly straight into Uyo before midday.
translation.yo: Àwọn ìbejì ikọ̀ Leicester City lórílẹ̀-èdè England Kelechi Iheanacho àti Wilfred Ndidi, tí ó fi mọ́ adiẹ̀yìnmú fún ikọ̀ Udinese, William Troost-Ekong ni ìgbàgbọ́ wà pé wọn ó léwájú àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù mẹ́tàlá mìíràn wá sínú àgọ́ ikọ̀ Super Eagles lónìí, àwọn alákòóso ló fi ìdí èyí múlẹ̀. Atamátàsé ikọ̀ Watford, Isaac Success ti dé sí ìlú Èkó lánàá ìgbàgbọ́ sì wà pé yóò tẹ ọkọ̀ ofurufú létí lọ tààrà sí Uyo kí ọjọ́ tó kanrí.

translation.en: Hapoel Beer Sheva of Israel midfielder, John Ogu who helped his side end their winless streak in the Israeli league on Saturday with a 4-1 win at home to Maccabi Petach Tikva confirmed he will be in camp today.
translation.yo: Adiẹ̀yìnmú ikọ̀ Hapoel Beer Sheva orílẹ̀-èdè Israel, tí ó ran ikọ̀ rẹ̀ lọ́wọ́ láti fi òpin sí ọ̀dá ìjáwé olúborí nínú Líìgì ilẹ̀ Israeli lọ́jọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday) pẹ̀lú ìjáwé olúborí àmì ayò mẹ́rin sí ọ̀kan nílé wọn pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Maccabi Petach Tikva fi ìdí rẹ̀ múlẹ̀ pé òun yóò wọ àgọ́ lónìí.

translation.en: Also expected in Super Eagles’camp are Kenneth Omeruo, Leon Balogun, William Troost-Ekong, Shehu Abdullahi, Oghenekaro Etebo, Ahmed Musa, Moses Simon, Henry Onyekuru, Semi Ajayi, Ikechukwu Ezenwa and Ola Aina.
translation.yo: Lára àwọn tí wọ́n tún ń retí ní àgọ́ Super Eagles ni àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù bíi Kenneth Omeruo, Leon Balogun, William Troost-Ekong, Shehu Abdullahi, Oghenekaro Etebo, Ahmed Musa, Moses Simon, Henry Onyekuru, Semi Ajayi, Ikechukwu Ezenwa àti Ola Aina.

translation.en: --- Rafael Nadal stays top of ATP rankings
translation.yo: --- Rafael Nadal dúró lókè téńtè síbẹ̀ lórí àtẹ ATP

translation.en: Spain’s Rafael Nadal continued to lead the men’s Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) world singles rankings released on Monday with 8,260 points, ahead of Switzerland’s Roger Federer.
translation.yo: Rafael Nadal ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Spain ti tẹ̀síwájú láti dipò aṣaájú mú lórí àtẹ Egbé àwọn Aláyò Tẹníìsì Àgbááyé (ATP) ti àwọn ọkùnrin tí wọ́n gbé jáde ní ọjọ́ ajẹ́ (Monday) pẹ̀lú ẹgbọ̀kànlélógójì àmì ṣaájú akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ ọmọ orìlẹ̀-èdè Switzerland.

translation.en: --- Musa Wins Saudi League Player Of The Week Award
translation.yo: --- Musa gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọ̀sẹ̀ tí ó dára jùlọ nílẹ̀ Saudi.

translation.en: Super Eagles winger Ahmed Musa has been named the best player in the third round of the Saudi Professional League, reports Completesportsnigeria.com.
translation.yo: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ẹ̀gbẹ́ ikọ̀ Super Eagles, Ahmed Musa ti gba àmì-ẹ̀yẹ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó dára jùlọ ní abala kẹta Líìgì apapọ̀ ilẹ̀ Saudi, CompletesportsNàìjííríà.com ló jábọ eléyìí.

translation.en: The former Leicester City and CSKA Moscow forward also received the sum of 10,000 Saudi Riyal (N970,045.83) for his efforts, according to the club’s website.
translation.yo: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ikọ̀ Leicester City àti CSKA Moscow tẹ́lẹ̀rí ọ̀hún, tún gba ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́wà Riyal owó ilẹ̀ Saudi tí í ṣe ọ̀kẹ́méjìdínláàádọ́dalélẹ́gbààrúnlélárúndínláàádọ́ta owó náírà fún iṣe takun-takun rẹ̀, gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìkànì ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù náa ṣe fi léde.

translation.en: Musa who has been in awesome form was also on target for the Super Eagles in their 2019 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) qualifier against Seychelles in Victoria which ended 3-0.
translation.yo: Musa tí ó ń ta sánsán lọ́wọ́ tún jẹ́ ẹni tí gbogbo ènìyàn rí iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ fún ikọ̀ Super Eagles nínú ìdíje ìpegedé sínú ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ (AFCON) ọdún 2019 wọn pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Seychelles èyí tí ó parí pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́ta sí òdo.

translation.en: --- U17 AFCON: NFF to give Eaglets top class preparations
translation.yo: ---  ìdíje AFCON àwọn ọ̀jẹ̀ wẹ́wẹ́: Àjọ NFF yóò fún Eaglets ní ìmúrasílẹ̀ tó mọ́nyánlórí.

translation.en: After picking the sole ticket from the West Africa zone for the CAF U17 Africa Cup of Nations, Nigeria Football Federation president, Amaju Pinnick said the Golden Eaglets will be given adequate preparations, so that they can win the tournament in Tanzania next year.
translation.yo: Lẹ́yìn tí wọn ti pegédé láti ìhà ìwọ̀ oorùn ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ sínú ìdíje ìpegedé sínú ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ àwọn ọ̀jẹ̀ wẹ́wẹ́. Ààrẹ Àjọ tó ń mójú bọ́ọ̀lù Afẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà (NFF), Amaju Pinnick sọ pé ikọ̀ Golden Eaglets yóò di fífún ní ìmúrasílẹ̀ tó mọ́nyánlórí, kí wọn ó lè gba ife ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje náà ní orílẹ̀-èdè Tanzania lọ́dún tó ń bọ̀.

translation.en: The Eaglets beat Ghana 3-1 on penalty shootout on Saturday night to win the ticket.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Eaglets lu ikọ̀ Ghana pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́ta sí ọ̀kan pẹ̀lú lálẹ́ ọjọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday) láti pegedé.

translation.en: Samson Tijani emerged as the Most Valuable Player, while Olakunle Olusegun was top scorer with four goals.
translation.yo: Samson Tijani ni ó gba àmì ẹ̀yẹ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tó ta sánsán jù lọ nígbà tí Olakunle Olusegun gba ti ẹni tí ó rí àwọn he jùlọ pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́rin.

translation.en: “What we have now is a bunch of players that are truly young and with a bright future.
translation.yo: “Àwọn tí a ní báyìí jẹ́ àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí wọ́n jẹ́ ọ̀dọ́ lóòótọ́ tí wọ́n sì ní ọjọ́ iwájú tó dára.

translation.en: For us in the federation, we have resolved to treat them like Super Eagles right from this stage.
translation.yo: Ní ti àwa nínú àjọ wa, a ti fẹnu kò láti máa ṣe wọ́n bí ikọ̀ Super Eagles láti ìpele yìí.

translation.en: We want them to be in the right mental and psychological mood as they grow up. The same way we prepared the Eagles for the World Cup in Russia is the way we are going to prepare them for Tanzania.
translation.yo: A fẹ́ kí wọ́n ní ìrònú àti ọpọlọ tó suwọ̀n gẹ́gẹ́ bí wọ́n ṣe ń dàgbà. Bí a ṣe pèsè ikọ̀ Eagles fún ìdije ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé ní Russia bẹ́ẹ̀ náà ni a ó pèsè wọn sílẹ̀ fún ìdíje ní Tanzania.

translation.en: We are looking beyond Tanzania.
translation.yo: À ń wò tayọ Tanzania pẹ̀lú.

translation.en: We are looking at the future and this is the time to begin to psyche up these kids,” Amaju said.
translation.yo: À ń wo ọjọ́ iwájú, àkókò yìí sì ni a ní láti bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ sí tọ́ àwọn ọmọ náà sọ́nà.

translation.en: He said the Eaglets will tour Qatar and Jordan before going to the tournament in Tanzania.
