translation.yo: Ó sọ pé ikọ̀ Eaglets yóò rin ìrìn àjò ìgbafẹ́ káàkiri ìlú Qatar àti ìlú Jordan kí wọ́n ó tó lọ sínú ìdíje ní Tanzania.

translation.en: --- Eaglets beat Niger, will face Ghana’s Starlets in final
translation.yo: --- Eaglets lu ikọ̀ Niger, wọn yóò kojú ikọ̀ Starlets Ghana ní aṣekágbá

translation.en: Nigeria were 2-1 winners over hosts Niger Republic on Wednesday in Niamey to book a date with Ghana and rekindle a 67-year-old Nigeria-Ghana rivalry.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà ni ó jáwé olúborí pẹ̀lú àmì ayò méjì sí ọ̀kan lórí ikọ̀ Niger tí ó gbàlejò wọn lọ́jọ́ru (Wednessday) láti lọ kọlu ikọ̀ Ghana tí yóò tún iná orogún ọdún mẹ́tàdínláàádọ́rin dá.

translation.en: The victory ensured the Golden Eaglets will take on the Black Starlets in Niamey on Saturday for a place in the 2019 Africa Under-17 Cup of Nations finals billed for Tanzania.
translation.yo: Ìjáwé olúborí yìí túmọ̀ sí pè ikọ̀ Golden Eaglets yóò kojú ikọ̀ Black Starlets ní Niamey lọ́jọ́ àbáméta (Saturday) fún àtirí ààyè nínú ìdìje ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ tí àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí ọjọ́ orí wọn ò ju mẹ́tàdínlógún lọ tí wọ́n ṣètò láti wáyé lórílẹ̀-èdè Tanzania.

translation.en: The Eaglets kept their heads and did the hard work they had to do by beating hosts Niger Republic 2-1 in a very competitive match at the General Seyni Kountche Stadium.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Eaglets mú ara gidi wọ́n sì ṣiṣẹ́ wọn bí iṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú bí wọ́n ṣe lu ikọ̀ Niger Republic tí ó gbàlejò wọn pẹ̀lú àmì ayò méjì sí òdo nínú ìfigagbaga yìí tí ó gbóná girigiri ní pápá ìṣeré General Seyni Kountche.

translation.en: He had scored a brace in the 2-3 defeat to Burkina Faso in their opening match and another in the 5-1 mauling of Cote d’Ivoire last week.
translation.yo: Wọ́n gbá àmì ayò méjì wọlé nínú ìpadánù alámì ayò méjì sí mẹta pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Burkina Faso nínú ìfigagbága ìṣíde wọn kí wọ́n ó tó dáná ìyà fún ikọ̀ Cote d’Ivoire pẹ̀lú àmì ayò márùn-ún sí ọ̀kan ní ọ̀sẹ̀ tó kọjá.

translation.en: --- Weah makes ‘shocking International return’ against Nigeria……at 51!
translation.yo: --- Weah padà wá lọ́nà tó ya gbogbo àgbááyé lẹ́nu nínú ìdíje pẹ̀lú Nàìjííríà……lẹ́ni ọdún mọ́kànléláàádọ́ta!

translation.en: Liberia President and former World Footballer of the Year George Weah made a surprise return to international competition in Monrovia on Tuesday, playing in a 2-1 loss to Nigeria.
translation.yo: Ààrẹ orílẹ̀-èdè Liberia àti àgbábọ́ọ̀lù tó ta sánsán jùlọ lágbàáyé nígbà kan rí George Weah padà sínú ìfigagbága àgbááyé lọ́nà tí ó yani lẹ́nu púpọ̀ ní ìlú Monrovia lọ́jọ́ ìṣẹ́gun (Tuesday), ó gbá bọ́ọ̀lù nínú ìpádánù alámì ayò méjì sí ọ̀kan sọ́wọ́ ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà.

translation.en: The match came up a few weeks short of his 52nd birthday and Liberia had arranged the friendly to retire the number 14 jersey made famous by Weah.
translation.yo: Ìdíje yìí wá lẹ́yìn ọ̀ṣẹ̀ díẹ̀ tí ó ṣe ayẹyẹ ọjọ́ ìbí ọdún méjìléláàádọ́ta tí orílẹ̀-èdè Liberia sì ṣètò ìdíje náà láti fi ẹ̀yin Weah, gbajúgbajà aláṣọ ìgbábọ́ọ̀lù nọ́ḿbà ẹ̀rìnlá tì.

translation.en: However, fans were in for a shock when, 16 years after his last international appearance, the striker led the national team onto the pitch wearing it instead.
translation.yo: Bákan náà, àwọn alátìlẹyìn wà ní ipò ìyàlẹ́nu nígbà tí wọ́n rí atamátàsé yìí tí ó tún gbé aṣọ gánrùn ṣíwájú ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè náà wọ orí pápá lẹ́yìn ọdún mẹ́rìndínlógún tí ó ti fara hàn gbẹ̀yìn.

translation.en: Media reports said Weah, who led the attack and showed glimpses of the class that made him a household name around the world, he received a standing ovation from fans when he was substituted on 79 minutes.
translation.yo: Ìròyìn fi léde pé Weah, tí ó gbá ọwọ́ iwájú pátápátá tí ó sì pitú rẹpẹtẹ irú èyí tí ó sọ orúkọ rẹ̀ di tọ́ọ́rọ́ fọ́n kálé káàkiri àgbááyé gba ìdúró kíni láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn alátìlẹyìn nígbà tí wọ́n rọ́pò rẹ̀ ní ìṣẹ́jú kọkàndínlọ́gọ́dọ́rin.

translation.en: Goals from Henry Onyekuru and Simeon Nwankwo helped Nigeria to a 2-0 lead before the hosts pulled one back through a Kpah Sherman penalty late in the game.
translation.yo: Àmì ayò láti ọwọ́ Henry Onyekuru àti Simeon Nwankwo ni ó ran órílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà lọ́wọ́ láti léwájú pẹ̀lú àmì ayò méjì sí òdo kí ó tó di pé ikọ̀ tí ó wà nílé yìí dá ọ̀kan padà pẹ̀lú gólì-wò-mí-n-gbá-a-sí-ọ láti Kpah Sherman ní ọwọ́ ìparí ayò náà.

translation.en: Weah enjoyed a career in Europe spanning nearly a decade and a half that saw him play for Monaco, Paris Saint-Germain and Marseille in France, AC Milan in Italy.
translation.yo: Weah gbádùn ìgbésí ayé rẹ̀ ní ilè Europe tí ó fẹ́rẹ̀ẹ́ lò tó ọdún mẹ́wàá àbọ̀ èyí tí ó mú u kópa fún àwọn ikọ̀ bíi Monaco, Paris Saint-Germain àti Marseille ní orílẹ̀-èdè France, AC Milan ní orílẹ̀-èdè Italy.

translation.en: He also played for English sides Manchester City and Chelsea.
translation.yo: Ó tún kópa fún ikọ̀ ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì Manchester City àti Chelsea.

translation.en: Weah was named the 1995 World Footballer of the Year; he also won the Ballon d’Or in the same year and remains the only African to win either award.
translation.yo: Weah ní ó di kíkéde gẹ́gẹ́ bí agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó ta sánsán jùlọ lágbàáyé lọ́dún 1995 bákan náà ni ó gba àmì ẹ̀yẹ Ballon d’Or ní ọdún yìí kan náà òun sì ni ọmọ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ kan ṣoṣo tí ó ṣì gba àwọn àmì ẹ̀yẹ́ méjéèjì yìí.

translation.en: --- Hiddink appointed coach of Chinese Olympic team
translation.yo: --- Hiddink jẹ́ yíyàn gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ Olympic orílẹ̀-èdè China

translation.en: Guus Hiddink has been tasked with ensuring China qualify for the finals of the 2020 Olympic Games football tournament after the former Real Madrid and Netherlands coach was handed the reins of the country’s under 21 team on Monday.
translation.yo: Guus Hiddink ti di fífún ní ojúṣe láti rí i pé ikọ̀ China pegedé sí àṣekágbá ìdíje Olympic ọdún 2020 lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n fa ikọ̀ ọ̀dọ́ tí ọjọ́ orí wọn kò ju mọ́kànlélógún lọ lé akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Real Madrid àti ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Netherlands tẹ́lẹ̀rí ọ̀hún lọ́wọ́ lọ́jọ́ ajé (Monday).

translation.en: Hiddink, 71, becomes the latest big name coach to move to China since the country’s president, Xi Jinping, stated his desire for the nation to become a global football power.
translation.yo: Hiddink, ẹni ọ̀kànléláàládọ́rin ọdún, ni akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ńlá tí ó tuntun jù tí yóò kọjá sí orílẹ̀-èdè China láti ìgbà tí ààrẹ orílẹ̀-èdè náà, Xi Jinping, ti fi ìfẹ́ hàn láti sọ orílẹ̀-èdè náà di ilè agbára eré bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé.

translation.en: The Dutchman joins fellow European Cup-winning coach Marcello Lippi on the payroll of the CFA, with the Italian World Cup winner currently preparing the senior team for the finals of the Asian Cup in the United Arab Emirates in January.
translation.yo: Ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Neitherland yìí dara pọ̀ mọ́ akẹẹgbẹ́rẹ̀ tí ó ti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ ní ilẹ̀ Europe rí ìyẹn Marcello Lippi lórí àtẹ ìsanwó àjọ CFA, pẹ̀lú bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tí ó kó ikọ̀ Italy gba ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé yìí ń tirẹ̀ ṣe ń pèsè ikọ̀ àgbà ilẹ̀ náà sílẹ̀ lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ fún àṣekágbá ìdíje Ife ilẹ̀ Asia tí yóò wáyé ní United Arab Emirates ní inú oṣù kínní.

translation.en: Top coaches such as Luiz Felipe Scolari, Fabio Capello, Manuel Pellegrini and Andre Villas Boas have also had stints with clubs in the Chinese Super League.
translation.yo: Àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ńláńlá bíi Luiz Felipe Scolari, Fabio Capello, Manuel Pellegrini àti Andre Villas Boas pẹ̀lú ti ní nǹkan ṣe pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹgbẹ́ agbábọ́ọ̀lù nínú ìdíje Chinese Super League.

translation.en: --- PHOTOS: Super Eagles ‘basking in the Seychelles sunshine’
translation.yo: --- ÀWỌN ÀWÒRÁN: Ikọ̀ Super Eagles ń yá òòrùn ilẹ̀ Seychelles’

translation.en: The Super Eagles are all but set for the make-or-mar AFCON qualifier against Seychelles in Victoria on Saturday.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Super Eagles ti ṣetán láti kojú ikọ̀ Seychelles nínú ìdíje kàkà-kéku-ó –jẹ-èsé tí yóò wáyé ní ìlú Victoria ní ọjọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday).

translation.en: With a full house, the Nigerian side have been enjoying the ‘sweet sun’ that has swept this enchanting Island.
translation.yo: Pẹ̀lú bí ilé ṣe kún fọ́fọ́, ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà tí ń gbádùn oor̀un àràn yẹ́ẹ́ tí ó gba orí erékùsù yìí kan

translation.en: --- UEFA NL: France holds Germany to a goalless draw
translation.yo: --- LÍÌGÌ UEFA NATION: France ta ọ̀mị̀ òdo sí òdo pẹ̀lú Germany

translation.en: World champions France never hit top form and had third-choice keeper Alphonse Areola to thank for a 0-0 draw against Germany in their inaugural Nations League game on Thursday, their first appearance since lifting the World Cup.
translation.yo: France tí ife ẹ̀yẹ́ àgbááyé wà lọ́wọ́ rẹ̀ kò bóde pàdé ó sì nílò láti dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ aṣọ́lé kẹta wọn Alphonse Areola fún ọ̀mị̀ òdo sí òdo tí wọ́n gbá pẹ̀lú Germany nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìdíje Líìgì UEFA Nations lọ́lẹ̀ lọ́jọ́bọ (Thursday), àkọ́kọ́ irú ẹ̀ láti ìgbà tí wọ́n ti gbé igbá oró ife ẹ̀yẹ agbááyé sókè.

translation.en: On a rainy night, Germany won back some respect with a battling performance after their shock World Cup group- stage exit in Russia, their earliest in 80 years in the tournament.
translation.yo: Ní inú òjò lálẹ́ ọjọ́ yìí, ikọ̀ Germany tún iyì wọn rà padà lẹ́yìn ìjákúrò láti abala àkọ́kọ́ nínú ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ́ àgbááyé tí ó yani lẹ́nu gbáà ní orílẹ̀-èdè Russia, èyí tí ó yára jù nínú ìdíje náà láti bí ọgọ́rin ọdún sẹ́yìn.

translation.en: “It was a tight match and we were better sometimes and at other times they were better,” said France coach Didier Deschamps.
translation.yo: “Ó jẹ́ ìdíje tí ó gbóná girigiri pẹ̀lú bí a ṣe ń fakọyọ jù wọ́n lọ tí àwọn náà sì ń fakọyọ jù wá lọ nígbà mìíràn.,” ni Didier Deschamps akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ France wí.

translation.en: --- CAF U-17 AFCON: Eaglets target win over Burkina Faso
translation.yo: --- ìdíje AFCON àwọn ọjẹ wẹ́ẹ́wẹ́: ikọ̀ Eaglets fojú sun ìjáwé olúbori lórí ikọ̀ Burkina Faso

translation.en: Mohammed Sanusi, General Secretary of the Nigeria Football Federation (NFF), on Sunday expressed confidence in the ability of the Golden Eaglets to beat Burkina Faso tomorrow.
translation.yo: Mohammed Sanusi, akọ̀wé àpapọ̀ àjọ tí ó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù afẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà (NFF), ní ọjọ́ àìkú (Sunday) fi ìdánilójú rẹ̀ hàn pé ikọ̀  Golden Eaglets yóò na ikọ̀ Burkina Faso ní ọ̀la.

translation.en: The U-17 West African Football Union (WAFU) B qualifiers gets underway in Niger Republic on Monday.
translation.yo: Ìdíje ìpegedé Àjọ tí ó mójútó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá ní ìhà ìwọ̀ oòrùn ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ (WAFU) ti àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí ọjọ́ orí wọn ò ju mẹ́tàdínlógún ìpín B yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ní orílẹ̀-èdè Niger Republic lọ́jọ́ ajé (Monday)

translation.en: Sanusi said the Manu Garba-led boys were fit and ready to crush any opponent in West Africa.
translation.yo: Sanusi sọ pé ikọ̀ tí Manu Garba kó ṣòdí yìí dáńtọ́, wọ́n sì ṣetán àtibi ikọ̀ yóòwù tí ó jẹ́ alátakò wọn ní ìhà ìwọ̀ oòrùn ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ wó.

translation.en: He said they were well prepared to rekindle the glory of Nigeria in the U-17 category of global football.
translation.yo: Ó ní àwọn ti ṣetán láti dá ògo eré bọ́ọ̀lù ikọ̀ àwọn ọ̀dọ́ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà tí ọjọ́ orí wọn ò ju mẹ́tàdínlógún padà lágbàáyé.

translation.en: “We should be prayerful because tactically our boys are good to go; therefore, what we need now is just God’s intervention,” the federation scribe said.
translation.yo: “A nílò láti kún fún àdúrà, ní ti ọgbọ́n àwọn ọmọ wa ní ọgbọ́n lórí ṣùgbọ́n a nílò ìdásí Ọlọ́run,” èyí ni òsìṣẹ́ ìjọba àpapọ̀ yìí wí.

translation.en: Nigeria’s U-17 team would contend with two opponents in their group because of the disqualification of Benin Republic.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí ọjọ́ orí wọn ò ju mẹ́tàdínlógún ti orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà yóò kojú ikọ̀ méjì látàrí yíyọ ikọ̀ Benin Republic dànù.

translation.en: Ten out of 20 Benin Republic players failed the Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) test, leading to their disqualification.
translation.yo: Mẹ́wàá nínú ogún àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù ikọ̀ Benin Republic ni wọn kò pegedé pẹ̀lú ìdánwò àyẹ̀wò inú ara (MRI), èyí tí wọ́n fi yọ ikọ̀ náà dànù bí ẹni yọ jìgá.

translation.en: However, Nigeria is left with Cote d’ Voire and Burkina Faso in the Group.
translation.yo: Ní báyìí ikọ̀ Cote d’ Voire àti ikọ̀ Burkina Faso nìkan ni yó ku ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà kù nínú ìpín wọn.

translation.en: The Golden Eaglets will be slugging it out on Monday by 4 p .m. local time with Burkina Faso.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Golden Eaglets bákan náà yóò máa wàákò lọ́jọ́ Ajé (Monday) láago mẹ́rin ọ̀sán aago abẹ́lé pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Burkina Faso.

translation.en: The WAFU qualifiers is for qualification to the U-17 African Cup of Nations (AFCON) to hold in Tanzania which is a qualifying finale for U-17 World Cup tagged Peru 2019.
translation.yo: Ìdíje ìpegedé (WAFU) yìí jẹ́ ìpegedé fún ife ẹ̀yẹ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ (AFCON) àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí ọjọ́ orí wọn ò ju mẹ́tàdínlógún tí yóò wáyé ní orílẹ̀-èdè Tanzania èyí tí ó tún jẹ́ òsùwọ̀n ìpegedé sí ìdíje ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tí ọjọ́ orí wọn ò ju mẹ́tàdínlógún èyí tí yóò wáyé ní orílẹ̀-èdè Peru lọ́dún 2019.

translation.en: --- Team Nigeria departs for World Para Table Tennis Championships
translation.yo: --- Ikọ̀ Nàìjííríà gbéra lọ sí Idíje Ajẹmáyòtẹníísì àgbááyé.

translation.en: Team Nigeria para table tennis players have left Lagos on for the 2018 World Para Table Tennis Championships in Beijing.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ tí ó sojú Nàìjííríà níbi Idíjẹ Ajẹmáyòtẹníísì kúrò ní Èkó lọ sí ibi ìdíje Ajẹmáyòtẹníísì àgbááyé ní ìlú Beijing.

translation.en: The team, comprising one female and three males, departed aboard an Ethiopian Airlines flight.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ yìí tí ó ní obìnrin kan àti ọkùnrin mẹ́ta gbéra kúrò lórílẹ̀-èdè pẹ̀lú ọkọ̀ òfurufú Ethiopian

translation.en: The lone female athlete is Faith Obazuaye, while her male counterparts are Nasiru Bello, Tajudeen Agunbiade and Olufemi Alabi.
translation.yo: Obìnrin kan ṣoṣo yìí ni Faith Obazuaye, nígbà tí àwọn ọkùnrin akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ jẹ́ Nasiru Bello, Tajudeen Agunbiade àti Olufemi Alabi.

translation.en: The championships will serve off on Aug. 27 and end  on Sept. 3.
translation.yo: Ìdíje yìí yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ní ọjọ́ kẹtàdínlọ́gbọ̀n oṣù kẹjọ yóò sì parí ní ọjọ́ kẹta oṣù kẹsàn-án.

translation.en: Bankole, speaking before departure, said the athletes were fully prepared for the task ahead.
translation.yo: Bankole, nígbà tí ó ń sọ̀rọ̀ kí wọ́n tó gbéra, so pé àwọn aláyò yìí ti múra gidigidi fún iṣẹ́ tí ó wà níwájú wọn.

translation.en: “We believe in them and their abilities and I’m optimistic they will make the country proud. They should however, play all games cautiously with their eyes on the target.”
translation.yo: “A nígbàgbọ́ nínú wọn àti ohun tí wọ́n lè ṣe, mo sì ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé wọn yóò mú orílẹ̀-èdè wa yangàn. Kí àwọn pẹ̀lú fi ara balẹ̀ gbá gbogbo ayò náà pẹ̀lú àfojúsùn.

translation.en: Bankole, who is also a Deputy Commissioner of Police, however, appealed to Nigerians resident in China to come and encourage their compatriots.
translation.yo: Bankole, tí ó jẹ́ Kọmíṣánnà Ọlọ́pàá, bákan náà pàrọwà sí àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà tí wọ́n ń gbé ní orílẹ̀-èdè China láti wá wú àwọn olùfọkànsìn wọ̀nyí lórí.

translation.en: --- I’ll ensure I stay long at City – Kompany
translation.yo: --- Mà á ríi pé mo dúró pé nínú ikọ̀ City – Kompany

translation.en: Manchester City captain Vincent Kompany says his natural athletic ability and desire to keep improving can help him prolong his career with the English Premier League champions.
translation.yo: Balógun ikọ̀ Manchester City Vincent Kompany sọ pé àbùdá àdámọ́ òun láti máa ṣe dáadáa le mú kí òun ó fa ọjọ́ òun gùn nínú ikọ̀ aṣaájú ìdíje Premier League ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì náà.

translation.en: The 32-year-old Belgian international defender has been forced to overcome a number of injury issues during his 10-year stint at the club.
translation.yo: Ọmọ ọdún méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n adiẹ̀yìnmú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Belgium yìí ti gbìyànjú lọ́pọ̀ láti jàjà bọ́ lọ́wọ́ oríṣìíríṣìí ìfarapa láti nǹkan bí ọdún mẹ́wàá tí ó ti wà nínú ikọ̀ náà..

translation.en: “I think what people have never really understood with me is that aside from having had some injuries I’m actually lucky to be a good athlete naturally.
translation.yo: “Mo wòye pé ohun tí àwọn ènìyàn ò tíì fi taratara mọ̀ nípa mi ni pé yàtọ̀ sí níní àwọn ìfarapa, mó rí oore-ọ̀fẹ́ jíjẹ́ alábùdá àdámọ́ eré sísá gbà.

translation.en: “So, I still feel mobile,” Kompany, whose contract expires next season, told the club’s website.
translation.yo: “Nítorí náà, eré ṣì ṣì wà lẹ́sẹ̀ mi,” Kompany, tí àdéhùn rẹ̀ yóò tẹnu bẹpo ní sáà tó ń bọ̀ ló sọ fún ìkànnì àyélujára ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù náà.

translation.en: Kompany was a substitute in Manchester City’s 2-0 win at Arsenal in their league opening fixture, but he returned to the starting side which thumped Huddersfield Town 6-1 last weekend.
translation.yo: Kompany jẹ́ gbígbé wọlé nínú ìjáwé olúborí àmì ayò méjì sí òdo pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Arsenal nínú ìdíje àkọ́kọ́ wọn, ṣùgbọ́n ó bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ tí ó fìyà jẹ ikọ̀ Huddersfield Town pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́fà sí ọ̀kan ní òpin ọ̀sẹ̀ tó kọjá.

translation.en: --- Hockey: 2018 Super League kicks off on Saturday
translation.yo: --- Ayò Hockey: Ìdíje Líìgì ọdún 2018 yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ lọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday)

translation.en: Fatai Atanda, Technical Committee member of the Nigeria Hockey Federation (NHF), on Thursday said the 2018 Super League would kick off on Saturday at the National Stadium, Abuja.
translation.yo: Fatai Atanda, ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ìgbìmọ̀ ìmọ̀ ẹ̀rọ àjọ tó ń mójú tó ìdíje Hocky lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà (NHF), sọ ní ọjọ́bọ (Thursday) pé Líìgì ayò Hockey ti ọdún 2018 yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ní ọjọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday) ní pápá ìṣeré ìjọba àpapọ̀, Abuja.

translation.en: Atanda said the tourney would be played on four quarter format, and that 16 clubs, comprising eight male and female categories, would participate in the tournament.
translation.yo: Atanda sọ pé ìpín mẹ́rin ni wọn yóò pín ìdíje náà sí, ó sì sọ pé ikọ̀ mẹ́rìndínlógún ikọ̀ ọkùnrin mẹ́jọ àti obìnrin mẹ́jọ ni yóò kópa.

translation.en: In the previous year, Kada Queens of Kaduna lifted the trophy for the female category, while Niger Flickers won the men category.
translation.yo: Lọ́dún tó kọjá, Kada Queens ìlú Kaduna ni ó gbé ife ti àwọn obìnrin lọ ilé nígbà tí Niger Flickers gba ti àwọn ọkùnrin.

translation.en: The league is in line with the efforts of the federation to promote hockey among Nigerians, especially the youth, to enhance professionalism.
translation.yo: Ìdíje yìí wà ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú àlàkalẹ̀ àjọ yìí láti tẹ ayò hockey síwájú lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà, pàápàá jùlọ láàrin àwọn ọ̀dọ́ láti lè ṣe àlékún iṣẹ́ ọwọ́.

translation.en: --- Falconets can beat Spain – Garba Manu
translation.yo: --- Ikọ̀ Falconets lè lu ikọ̀ Spain – Garba Manu

translation.en: Golden Eaglets Coach Manu Garba says he is optimistic of the Falconets’ capability to beat their Spaniard counterparts in the quarter-finals of the ongoing FIFA U-20 Women World Cup in France.
translation.yo: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Golden Eaglet Manu Garba sọ pé ó dá òun lójú pé Ikọ̀ Falconets ní agbára àti lu akẹẹgbẹ́ wọn láti orílẹ̀-èdè Spain nínú ìfigagbága ìpele kejì sí àṣekágbá ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé àwọn ọ̀dọ́bìnrin tí ọjọ́ orí wọn kò ju ogún ọdún lọ ní ìlú France.

translation.en: Garba, who expressed the optimism in Abuja,  said the Falconets had worked well for glory in the World Cup which they were determined to achieve.
translation.yo: Garba, tí ó fi àrídájú yìí hàn ní ìlú Abuja, sọ pé ikọ̀ Falconets ti ṣe iṣẹ́, wọ́n sì ti pinnu láti lè jẹ́ kí ògo ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé yìí jẹ́ tiwọn.

translation.en: “The Falconets have worked very hard to prepare for FIFA Women U-20 World Cup.
translation.yo: “Ikọ̀ Falconets ti ṣiṣẹ́ takuntakun láti múra sílẹ̀ fún ìdíje àṣekágbá ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé àwọn ọ̀dọ́bìnrin tí ọjọ́ orí wọn kò ju ogún ọdún lọ.

translation.en: “The quarter-finals is the knockout stage and it is possible to beat Spain if our girls can increase their penetration in the attack,’’ Garba said.
translation.yo: “ìpele kejì sí àṣekágbá jẹ̀ ìpele tí a ti ń jára ẹni bọ́, ó sì ṣeéṣe láti na ikọ̀ Spain tí àwọn ọmọbìnrin wa bá le mú àlékú bá ìṣọwọ́wọlé lọ́wọ́ iwájú wọn, ni Garba wí.

translation.en: The coach assured the Falconets of support of the entire country, saying that Nigeria was solidly behind them.
translation.yo: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá yìí fi àtìlẹyìn orílẹ̀-èdè yìí dá ikọ̀ Falconets lójú, ó sọ pé àwọn ọmọ Nàìjííríà wà lẹ́yìn wọn.

translation.en: He said that the team, with the help of God and hardwork, would qualify for the semi-finals.
translation.yo: Ó sọ pé ikọ̀ yìí pẹ̀lú ìrànlọ́wọ́ Ọlọ́run àti iṣẹ́ takuntakun yóò pegedé sí ipele tí ó kángun sí àṣekágbá.

translation.en: The Falconets on had Monday held China to a 1-1 draw to qualify for the quarter-finals.
translation.yo: Ikọ̀ Falconets lọ́jọ́ ajé (Monday) ta ọmì àmì ayò kọ̀ọ̀kan pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè China láti pegedé sí ìpele kejì sí àṣekágbá.

translation.en: --- A call for sponsorship has been put out for the sport competition in Nigeria.
translation.yo: --- Ìpè fún ìṣonígbọ̀wọ́ ti jẹ́ fífi síta fún àwọn eré ìdárayá lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà.

translation.en: Companies and individuals thata have the ability to spend into sport through cooperation of individuals in sport in Nigeria have been urged for sponsorship.
translation.yo: Àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ àti àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n lágbára láti náwó lé orí eré-ìdárayá ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà ti jẹ́ rírọ̀ fún ìṣonígbọ̀wọ́.

translation.en: Mr. Bukola Olapade, one of council in charge of the field sport competition in Africa, called African Athelethics Championship 2018 that came up in Asaba, Delta state said this when speaking to the newsmen in Asaba, Mr. Olapade now used the good work of Rite foods limited as an example, how they provided food and drink for the competitors in the competition.
translation.yo: Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Bukola Olapade, ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ọmọ ìgbìmọ̀ tí ó ń rí sí àwọn ìdíje orí pápá ní ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀, èyí tí wọ́n ń pè ní African Athelethics Championship ti ọdún 2018 tí ó wáyé ní ilú Asaba, ìpínlẹ̀ Delta state ni ó sọ èyí lásìkò tí ó ń bá àwọn oníròyìn sọrọ̀ ní ìlú Asaba, Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Olapade ní báyìí wá lo iṣẹ́ rere ilé-iṣẹ́ Rite foods limited gẹ́gẹ́ bí àpẹẹrẹ lórí bí wọ́n ṣe pèsè ohun jíjẹ àti ohun mímu fún àwọn olùdíje.

translation.en: When we approach them for their coporation in the sponsorship of the competition, immediately they showed interest, and they fully participated in the sporsorship of the of the field sport competition.
translation.yo: Nígbà tí a fi ìṣonígbọ̀wọ́ lọ̀ wọ́n, lẹ́sẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ ni wọ́n fi ìfẹ́ hàn sí i, wọ́n sì kópa délẹ̀ nínú ìṣonígbọ̀wọ́ ìdíje orí pápá náà.

translation.en: Mr. Olapade explained futher in the competition that many people at the opening ceremony were provided withfood and drink by Rites foods, and provided many soft drink and snacks for children in the competition.
translation.yo: Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Olapade tún ṣàlàyé síwájú sí i pé níbi ìdíje náà ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ènìyàn tí wọ́n wà níbi ayẹyẹ ìṣíde ní wọ́n pèsè ohun jíjẹ àti ohun mímu láti ọ̀dọ̀ Rites foods fún, bẹ́ẹ̀ ni wọ́n pèsè ẹlẹ́rìndòdò àti ìpanu fún àwọn ọmọ kéékèèké níbi ìdíje náà.

translation.en: The senior supervisor of Ritr Foods Ltd, Mr. Saleem Adegunwa established it that the company is trying all her best to support what will show the glory of Nigeria.
translation.yo: Olùbẹ̀wọ̀ àgbà fún ilé-iṣẹ́ Rite Foods Ltd, Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Saleem Adegunwa fi ìdí rẹ̀ múlẹ̀ pé ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ń gbìyàjú gbogbo ipá rẹ̀ láti ṣàtìlẹyìn ohun tí yóò gbé ògo Nàìjííríà jáde.

translation.en: ‘We have the believe that our people can do something different with their gifts, with our different support, by sponsoring, supporting with drums and other activities’
translation.yo: ‘A nígbàgbọ́ pé àwọn ènìyàn wa lè dá àwọn àrà ọ̀tọ̀ pẹ̀lú ẹ̀bùn wọn, àtìlẹ́yìn wa oríṣiríṣi, ìṣonígbọ̀wọ́, ìṣàtìlẹyìn pẹ̀lú ìlù, àti àwọn ohun mìíràn.

translation.en: He establish this in his words.
translation.yo: Ó sọ ọ́ di mímọ̀.

translation.en: Mr. Adegunwa said that Rit foods has spent something around Thirty million naira (N30 million) on the foods and drinks provided for the athletes , that which he said they ese as a support for the development of sport in Nigeria and Africa as a whole.
translation.yo: Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Adegunwa sọ pé ilé-iṣẹ́ Rite foods ti ná nǹkan bí ọgbọ̀n mílíọ́nù náírà (N30 million) lórí ohun jíjẹ àti ohun mímu tí wọ́n pèsè fún àwọn aláyò wọ̀nyí ẹ̀yí tí ó sọ pé àwọn ṣe gẹ́gẹ́ bí àtìlẹyìn fún eré ìdárayá ní orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà àti ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ lápapọ̀.

translation.en: The senior supervisor of the company assured us that, though the competition is coming to an end on Sunday, yet Rite foods will continue in his effort to support Sport competitions. He said the reason for the support of Ritr Foods for filed sport competition in Asaba in 2018 was that provision ofrefreshment for the Champion.
translation.yo: Olùbẹ̀wọ̀ àgbà fún ilé-iṣẹ́ yìí fi dá wa lójú pé, lóòótọ́ ni ìdíje yìí ń wá sí òpin ní ọjụ́ àìkú (Sunday), ṣùgbọ́n ilé-iṣẹ́ Rite foods yóò tẹ̀síwájú akitiyan rẹ̀ láti máa ṣàtìlẹyìn ìdíje náà. Ó sọ pé ìdí pàtàkì àtìlẹyìn ilé-iṣẹ́ Rite Foods fún ìdíje yìí ni ìlú Àsaba lọ́dún 2018 ni láti pèsè ohun jíjẹ fún àwọn ajáwé olúborí.

translation.en: He said the refreshments that will renew their strength afresh when competing.
translation.yo: Ó sọ pé àwọn ohun jíjẹ yìí yóò sọ okun wọn dọ̀tun bí wọ́n tún ṣe ń díje sí i.

translation.en: --- Thank you – Ta Lou relishes Asaba triumph, appreciates fans
translation.yo: --- E ṣé o – Ta Lou relishes ìjáwé olúborí Asaba, ó dú pé lọ́wọ́ àwọn alátilẹyìn

translation.en: Following her triumph in the 100 metres final of the 2018 African Senior Athletics Championship in Asaba, Ivorien sprint star Ta Lou Marie Josée‏ has expressed her appreciation for the massive support from her countrymen.
translation.yo: Látàrí ìjáwé olúborí rẹ̀ nínú ìdíje ọlọ́gọ́rùn mítà ní àṣekágbá ìdíje àwọn Àgbà Asáré orí pápá ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ ọdún 2018 ní ìlú Asaba, Gbajúgbajà ẹlẹ́ṣẹ̀ ehoro ọmọ ilẹ̀ Ivory coast Ta Lou Marie Josée‏ ti fi ẹ̀mí ìmoore rẹ̀ hàn fún àtilẹ́yìn ńlá láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn olólùfẹ́ eré ìdárayá lórílẹ̀-èdè.

translation.en: Marie Josee Ta Lou on Thursday won the gold medal in a time of 11.15 seconds, beating Ghana’s Janet Amponsah who clocked 11.54 seconds; and Nigeria’s young prodigy Udo Joy-Gabriel who finished with a time of 11.58 seconds.
translation.yo: Marie Josee Ta Lou lọ́jọ́bọ (Thursday) gba àmì ẹyẹ wúrà ìdíje náà pẹ̀lú eré ìṣẹ́jú àáyá mọ́kànlá-lé-ìṣẹ́jú-iná-mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dógún 11.15 tí ó fi na Janet Amponsah ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Ghana tí ó sá tirẹ̀ ní ìṣẹ́jú àáyá méjìlá-dín- ìṣẹ́jú-iná-mẹ́fa 11.54 seconds; nígbà tí ọ̀dọ́mọdebìnrin ọmọ Nàìjííríà Udo Joy-Gabriel pári tirẹ̀ pẹ̀lú ìṣẹ́jú àáyá méjìlá-dín- ìṣẹ́jú-iná-méjì

translation.en: With the 100 metres title now in the bag, Ta Lou will try to consolidate on her global ranking by putting up stronger showings on the IAAF Diamond league circuit later in the year.
translation.yo: Pẹ̀lú bí ó se ti gba àmì ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje ọlọ́gọ́rùn mítà sápò rẹ̀, Ta Lou yóò gbìyàjú láti mú ìgbèrú bá ìkópa ipò rẹ̀ lágbàáyé nípa kíkópa dáradára nínú ìdíje IAAF tí yóò wáyé láìpẹ́ yìí.

translation.en: --- A disabled dancer encourage the Kenya Citizen.
translation.yo: --- Àkàndá ẹ̀dá oníjó gba àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Kenya níyànjú.

translation.en: The world health organization has said over eighty (81) million Africans that are diabled, and many of them face discouragement and hatred, which can kill their opportunity to take part in the in education, works and their well being.
translation.yo: Àjọ Elétò Ilera Àgbááyé ti sọ pé ó lé ní ọ̀kànlélọ́gọ́rin mílíọ̀nù àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Adúláwọ̀ tí ó jẹ́ Àkàndá, bẹ́ẹ̀ni ọ̀pọ̀ nínú wọn sì ń fojú winá ìrẹ̀wẹ̀sì ọkàn àti ìkórìíra, léyìí tí ó ń ṣe àkóbá fún àǹfààní wọn láti kópa nínú ètò ẹ̀kọ́, iṣẹ́ àti ìgbáyégbádùn.

translation.en: For someone to dande in air is one of the common dance among the disabled in Kenya.
translation.yo: Fún ènìyàn láti jó lójú ofurufú jẹ́ ọ̀kan lára àwọn ijó tí ó wọ́pọ̀ láàárín àwọn àkàndá lórílẹ̀-ède Kenya.

translation.en: Nicholas Ouma Odhiambo said that the team gave him the opportunity to showcase in the dance competition.
translation.yo: Nicholas Ouma Odhiambo sọ pé ikọ̀ yìí fún òhun ní oore-ọ̀fẹ́ láti lè kópa nínú ìdíje ijó jíjó náà

translation.en: --- Why i accepted the Juventus challenge – Ronaldo
translation.yo: --- Ìdí tí mo fi gba iṣẹ́ ikọ̀ Juventus – Ronaldo

translation.en: Portuguese striker Cristiano Ronaldo says he joined Italian giants Juventus because he wants to help the ‘Old Lady’ win more trophies – particularly the UEFA champions league.
translation.yo: Atamátàsé ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Portugal Christiano Ronaldo sọ pé òun dara pọ̀ mọ́ ògbóhùntarìgì ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Italy torí pé òun fẹ́ ràn ikọ̀ 'old lady' ọ̀hún lọ́wọ́ láti túbọ̀ máa gba ife ẹ̀yẹ sí i pàápàá jùlọ ìfẹ́ ẹ̀yẹ UEFA Champions League.

translation.en: Speaking to the media shortly after his unveiling, Ronaldo said he wanted to leave a mark on the Serie A.
translation.yo: Nígbà tí ó ń bá àwọn oníròyìn sọ̀rọ̀ lẹ́yìn ìgbà tí a ṣí aṣọ lójú rẹ̀, Ronaldo sọ pé òun fẹ́ ní ipa nínú ìdíje Serie A.

translation.en: “I like challenges and I know that this will be a difficult one.
translation.yo: "Mo fẹ́ràn ìfigagbága, mo sì mọ̀ pé èyí yóò le.

translation.en: “The standing ovation I received here at the Allianz was a spectacular moment for me.
translation.yo: "Ìdúrókíni tí mo gbà ní Allianz níbi jọ mí lójú.

translation.en: Ronaldo promised to end Juventus’s European barren run.
translation.yo: Ronaldo ṣèlérí láti fi òpin sí ọ̀dá ife European tí ó bá ikọ̀ Juventus.

translation.en: Ronaldo joined Juventus from Real Madrid in a deal worth over 100 million pounds.
translation.yo: Ronaldo dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ Juventus láti ikọ̀ Real Madrid pẹ̀lú àdéhùn owó tí ó lé ọgọ́rùn-ún owó pounds.

translation.en: Within nine years, Ronaldo won four UEFA champions league titles, and two La Liga championships.
translation.yo: Láàárín ọdún mẹ́sàn-án Ronaldo gba ife ẹ̀yẹ UEFA Champions league mẹ́rin àti ife La Liga méjì.

translation.en: --- VON wins NUJ Women’s Table Tennis Tournament
translation.yo: --- VON gba àmì ẹyẹ ìdíje Teníìsì orí tábìlì Obìnrin tí NUJ gbé kalẹ̀.

translation.en: Voice of Nigeria’s Kissit Golit has emerged winner of the Women’s 2nd NUJ Chapel Table Tennis tournament.
translation.yo: Kissit Golit ti Voice of Nigeria tí gbé igbá orókè nínú ìdíje Teníìsì orí tábìlì Obìnrin tí NUJ gbé kalẹ̀ ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kkejì irú rẹ.

translation.en: The annual tournament which enters its 2nd edition was played on Saturday, 14th July 2018 at the Chinese cultural central, Abuja.
translation.yo: Ìdíje ọlọ́dọọdún yìí tí ó tí wọ ẹ̀ẹ̀kejì irú rẹ̀ jẹ́ gbígbá ní ọjọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday), Ọjọ́ kẹrìnlá, Oṣù keje ọdún 2018 ní gbongan ilé àṣà ilẹ̀ China ní ìlú Abuja.

translation.en: The Chinese cultural centre is collaborating with the Nigerian Union of Journalist (NUJ), FCT chapel.
translation.yo: Ilé àṣà ilẹ̀ China ń ṣe àṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú Ẹgbẹ́ àwọn Òníròyin Nàìjíríà (NUJ) ẹ̀ka ti olú ìlú ilẹ̀ Nàìjíríà.

translation.en: Tukumbo Adesonya emerged winner of the men’s 2nd NUJ inter chapel Table Tennis Tournament, he represented News Agency of Nigeria beating defending champion from the ministry of information, Henry Onosanya, Sangotola Tobi was one of the three people that represented Voice of Nigeria but was unlucky as he was eliminated in the quarter final.
translation.yo: Tokumbo Adesanya ni ó gbaàmì ẹyẹ ìdíje Teníìsì orí tábìlì Ọkùnrin tí NUJ gbé kalẹ̀, ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì ti ẹ̀ka sí ẹ̀ka. Òun ló ṣojú àjọ oníròyìn ilẹ̀ Nàìjíríà láti na aṣojú ilé-iṣẹ́ ọ̀rọ̀ ìròyìn tí àmì ẹyẹ yìí wà lọ́wọ́ rẹ̀, Onosanya, Sangotola Tobi yìí wà lára àwọn mẹ́ta tí wọ́n ṣojú Voice of Nigeria ṣùgbọ́n kò bóde pàdé pẹ̀lú bí wọ́n ṣe yọwọ́ kílàńkó rẹ̀ ní ìpele kejì sí àsekágbá.

translation.en: Also representing Voices of Nigeria was Comfort Babatunde who was eliminated in the first round.
translation.yo: Lára àwọn tí ó tún ṣojú Voices of Nigeria ni Comfort Babatunde tí wọ́n já kúrò ní ìpele àkọ́kọ́.

translation.en: --- Official: Ronaldo joins Juventus in 105mn pounds deal
translation.yo: --- Ìròhìn gbangba: Ronaldo dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ Juventus pẹ̀lú àdéhùn àrùnlélọ́gọ́rùn-ún mílíọ́nu owó pounds.

translation.en: Portuguese striker Cristiano Ronaldo has officially left Real Madrid for Italian giants Juventus of Turin for 105 million pounds.
translation.yo: Atamátàsé ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè portugal Cristiano Ronaldo ti kúrò ní inú ikọ̀ Real Madrid bọ́ sí inú akínkanjú ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè Italy Juventus ti ìlú Turin pẹ̀lú  àrùnlélọ́gọ́rùn-ún mílíọ́nu owó pounds.

translation.en: In a statement released on Tuesday, Real Madrid said it sold Ronaldo to Juventus in-line with the wishes of the 33 year old.
translation.yo: Ní nínú ọ̀rọ̀ kan tí a fi léde lọ́jọ́ ìṣẹ́gun (Tuesday), Real Madrid sọ pé àwọn ta Ronaldo sí inú ikọ̀ Juventus ní ìbámu pẹ̀lú ìfẹ́ ọmọ ẹ̀tàlélọ́gbọ̀n ọdún ọ̀hún.

translation.en: “Real Madrid wants to express its gratitude to a player who has proved to be the best in the world and who has marked one of the brightest times in the history of our club and world football.
translation.yo: “Real Madrid fẹ́ fi ẹ̀mí ìmoore wọn hàn sí agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó ti fi ara rẹ̀ hàn gẹ́gẹ́ bí agbábọ́òlù tí ó dára jùlọ lágbàáyé tí ó sì ti nípa lórí àwọn àsìkò tí ó dára fún wa jùlọ nínú ìtàn bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lágbàáyé.

translation.en: “Beyond the conquered titles, the trophies achieved and the triumphs achieved in the playing fields during these 9 years, Cristiano Ronaldo has been an example of dedication, work, responsibility, talent and improvement,” the statement said.
translation.yo: “Yàtọ̀ sí àwọn àmì ẹyẹ yìí, àwọn ife ẹ̀yẹ tí ó gbà àti àwọn ìjáwé olúborí rẹ̀ lórí pápá láàrin ọdún mẹ́sàn-án yìí, Cristiano Ronaldo ti jẹ́ àpẹẹrẹ ìfarajìn, ìṣojúṣe, ẹ̀bùn àti ìlọsíwájú.” nínú ọ̀rọ̀ náà.

translation.en: Ronaldo leaves the Spanish capital having become the top scorer in the history of Real Madrid with 451 goals in 438 games.
translation.yo: Ronaldo kúro ní olú ìlú orílẹ̀-èdè Spaini yìí lẹ́yìn tí ó ti di ẹni tí ó rí àwọn he jùlọ nínú ìtàn ikọ̀ Real Madrid pẹ̀lù àmì ayò ọ̀tàlénírinwódínmẹ́sàn-án nínú ifẹ̀sẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ òjìlénírinwódín-méjì.

translation.en: In total he won 16 titles, including 4 European Cups, 3 of them consecutive and 4 in the last 5 seasons.
translation.yo: Ní àpapọ̀ ó gba ife ẹ̀yẹ mẹ́rìndínlógún nínú wọn ni ife European mẹ́rin, méta jẹ́ léra wọn nígbà tí ìkẹrin jẹ́ sáà márùn-ún sẹ́yìn.

translation.en: --- Mahrez signs five-year deal with Man City
translation.yo: --- Mahrez tọwọ́ bọ ìwé àdéhùn ọdún márùn-ún pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Man City

translation.en: Algerian international Riyad Mahrez secured his move to Premier League champions Manchester City on Tuesday, seven months after his hopes were dashed when City refused to pay Leicester’s asking price.
translation.yo: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Algeria Riyad Mahrez parí ìtọkọ́sọ́ rẹ̀ lọsí ikọ̀ aṣáájú ìdíje Premier League, Manchester City lọ́jọ́ ìṣẹ́gun (Tuesday), lẹ́yìn oṣù méje tí ó ti sọ̀rètí nù làtàrí pé ikọ̀ City kọ̀ láti san owó tí ikọ̀ Leicester ń bèèrè fún.

translation.en: This time though Leicester said they had sold him for what is a club-record fee, with some reports suggesting the champions paid £60 million ($79.6million), which would make it their record buy.
translation.yo: Ní àsìkò yìí, ikọ̀ Leicester so pẹ́ àwọn tà á ní iye owó tí ó wọn inú ìwé ìtàn ikọ̀ náà, tí àwọn ìròyìn kan sì ń ní I lérò pé ikọ̀ aṣáájú yìí san ọgọ́ta mílíọ́nù owó pounds (Ọgọ́rin mílíọ́nù dín díẹ̀ Owó dọ́là) léyìí tí yóò sọ ọ́ di èyí tí ó ń wọ inú ìwé ìtàn.

translation.en: The 27-year-old a pivotal figure when Leicester stormed to a shock Premier League title in 2016 signed a five-year contract.
translation.yo: Ọmọ ọdún mẹ́tàdínlọ́gbọ̀n yìí tí ó jẹ́ èèkàn nígbà tí ikọ̀ Leicester gba ife Premier League lọ́nà ìyanu lọ́dún 2016 tọwọ́ bọ adéhùn ọdún márùn-ún.

translation.en: “I am so pleased to have joined City, a side playing great football under Pep Guardiola,.
translation.yo: “Inú mi dùn láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ City, ikọ̀ tí ó ń gbá bọ́ọ̀lù tó ta sánsán lábẹ́ Pep Guardiola.

translation.en: Watching them from afar has been a pleasure.
translation.yo: Wíwò wọ́n lókèèrè jẹ́ oun tí ó máa ń wù mí..

translation.en: Pep is committed to playing attacking football, which is a perfect for me, and City’s performances last season were outstanding.” Mahrez said.
translation.yo: Pep jẹ́ ẹni tí ó fi ara sí títi bọ́ọ̀lù síwájú, léyìí tí ó ṣe régí pẹ̀lú mi, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ìṣọwọ́ṣiṣẹ́ Cítì ní sáà tó lọ kò lẹ́gbẹ́” èyí ni Mahrez wí.

translation.en: ---Spain appoints Luis Enrique as new coach
translation.yo: ---Spain yan Luis Enrique gẹ́gẹ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tuntun.

translation.en: Spain’s football federation says former Barcelona coach Luis Enrique has been appointed to take charge of the national team.
translation.yo: Àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Spain ti sọ pé akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ Barcelona tẹ̀lẹ̀rí Luis Enrique ti di yíyàn gẹ́gẹ́ láti gba àkóso ikọ̀ orílẹ̀-èdè náà.

translation.en: He replaces Julen Lopetegui, who was sacked on the eve of the World Cup after accepting the job at Real Madrid, with Fernando Hierro taking temporary charge for the finals in Russia.
translation.yo: Ó rọ́pọ̀ Julen Lopetegui, tí wọ́n yọ níṣẹ́ ní ife ẹyẹ àgbááyé ku ọ̀la lẹ́yìn tí ó gba iṣẹ́ nínú ikọ̀ Real Madrid, nígbà tí Fernando Hierro ti ń tukọ̀ àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ní Russia fún igbà díẹ̀.

translation.en: Luis Enrique has signed a two-year contract.
translation.yo: Luis Enrique tọwọ́ bọ àdéhùn ọdún méjì.

translation.en: --- World Cup trophy on display in Moscow
translation.yo: --- Ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé di ṣíṣàfihàn ní Moscow

translation.en: The FIFA World Football Museum exhibition will present the 2018 FIFA World Cup winners’ trophy for the entire day of Sunday in Moscow.
translation.yo: Àjọ tó ń ṣàfihan nǹkan ìṣèmbayé eré ìdárayá FIFA yóò pàtẹ ìfe ẹ̀yẹ olùjáwé olúborí ọdún 2018 fún odidi ọjọ́ àìkú (Sunday) ní ìlú Moscow.

translation.en: It will be displayed alongside the replica of the Jules Rimet Cup, the trophy that was first presented to winners in 1930 when the competition started.
translation.yo: Yóò jẹ́ ṣíṣàfihàn pẹ̀lú ife ẹ̀yẹ irú rẹ̀, ife Jules Rimet, tí wọ́n kọ́kọ́ fún ẹni tí ó gba ìdìje náà lọ́dún 1930 nígbà tí ìdíje náà bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀.

translation.en: The exhibition, known as “The History Makers’’, will hold at the Hyundai Motorstudio on New Arbat Avenue in Moscow.
translation.yo: Ìṣàfihàn yìí tí a mọ̀ sí, “Àwọn Akọ̀tàn”, yóò wáyé ní yàrá àwòrán ilé-iṣẹ́ Hyundai Motorstudio ní agbègbè New ní ìlú Moscow.

translation.en: The exhibition will end five days after the final match of the 2018 FIFA World Cup in Russia on July 15.
translation.yo: Ìṣàfihàn yóò parí lẹ́yìn ọjọ́ karùn-ún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àsekágbá ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé ọdún 2018 lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia lọ́jọ́ kẹẹ̀ẹ́dógún oṣù keje.

translation.en: World football body, FIFA, said in a statement on Saturday that admission to the exhibition was free, adding that media representatives were allowed to visit the exhibition, take photos or film inside.
translation.yo: Àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lágbàáyé, FIFA, sọ nínú ọ̀rọ̀ kan lọ́jọ́ àbámẹ́ta (Saturday) pé ọ̀fẹ́ ni ìwọlé sí ibi Ìṣàfihàn yìí, ó fi kún un pé wọ́n gba àwọn oníróyìn láàyè láti wọlé, láti ya àwòrán àti láti ká àwòrán sílẹ̀ níbẹ̀.

translation.en: “The exhibition ground floor is a tribute to the passion and devotion of fans from all over the world and their role in making the FIFA World Cup a compelling spectacle.
translation.yo: “Ibi ìṣàfihàn yìí jẹ́ ìmọrírì ìfẹ́ àti ìkọbiarasí àwọn alátìlẹyìn káàkiri àgbááyé àti ipa wọn lórí ríra iyì fún ife ẹ̀yẹ FIFA àgbááyé.

translation.en: “There, visitors can see messages from fans of all 32 competing nations and a special display for the adidas Telstar Official Match Balls of the 2018 FIFA World Cup used for the kick-off of the 64 games played in Russia.
translation.yo: “Níbẹ̀, àwọn olùbẹ̀wò le rí àtẹ̀jíṣẹ́ láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn alátìlẹyìn àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè méjìlélọ́gbọ̀n tí wọn ń figa gbága àti àfihàn àwọn bọ́ọ̀lù tí wọn lò fún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ mẹ́rìnlélọ́gọ́ta ife ẹ̀yẹ FIFA àgbááyé ọdùn 2018 lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia tí ilé iṣẹ́ adidas pèsè.

translation.en: “After each match, the ball which started the game is added to the growing collection at the exhibition,’’ a statement by Moritz Ansorge, the FIFA World Football Museum collections manager, indicated.
translation.yo: “Lẹ́yìn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ kọ̀ọ̀kan, bọ́ọ̀lù tí ó bá bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà yóò di fífikún ara àwọn àfihàn yìí”,’’ ní ọ̀rọ̀ tí Moritz Ansorge alákòóso Àjọ tó ń ṣàfihan nǹkan ìṣèmbayé eré ìdárayá FIFA ṣe lálàyé.

translation.en: --- Tite gets new 4 year contract
translation.yo: --- Tite gba àdéhùn ọdún mẹ́rin mìíràn.

translation.en: Brazil’s Football Federation (CBF) is offering head coach Tite a new four-year deal, despite the five-time World Champion’s elimination in the quarter-finals.
translation.yo: Àjọ tó ń mójú tó bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Brazil (CBF) ń fi àdéhùn ọdún mẹ́rin mìíràn lọ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ náà Tite tòhun tẹnu ìjakúrò nínú ife ẹ̀yẹ agbááyé lẹ́ẹ̀marùn-ún ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ láti ìpele kejì sí àṣekágbá.

translation.en: According to the Brazilian website Globo, CBF is satisfied with the head coach’s work and is offering him a new contract.
translation.yo: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Globo ìtàkùn ilẹ̀ Brazil ṣe sọ, Ìṣọwọ́ṣiṣẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà yìí tẹ́ Àjọ CBF lọ́rùn, wọ́n sì ń fi àdéhùn mìíràn lọ̀ ọ́.

translation.en: The 57-year-old took charge of Brazil in June 2016 helping the team qualify for the 2018 FIFA World Cup from the first place among the South American teams.
translation.yo: Ẹni ọdún mẹ́tàdínlọ́gọ́ta gba àkóso ikọ̀ Brazil ní inú oṣù kẹfà ọdún 2016, ó si ran ikọ̀ náà lọ́wọ́ láti pegedé sí inú ife ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé FIFA ọdún 2018 pẹ̀lú ipò kíní láti inú àwọn orílẹ̀-èdè ilẹ̀ Guusu America.

translation.en: Under Tite’s management, Brazil have secured 20 victories and four draws losing only two games so far, including Friday’s defeat to Belgium.
translation.yo: Lábẹ́ àkóso Tite, ikọ̀ Brazil ti jáwé olúborí ní ìgbà ogún, wọ́n ta ọ̀mì mẹ́rin wọ́n sì pàdánù lẹ́ẹ̀mejì péré, nínú rẹ̀ ni ìpàdánù ọjọ́ ẹtì (Friday) pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ Belgium.
